property.title: Slogan
property.description: Optional brief slogan. Depending on your theme, settings, and viewport size, this may not display. It only shows in certain situations, essentially when there is room.

property.title: Enable Social Media Links
property.description: Enable social media links for this style. Go to UI.X Social Media under UI.X Options to set the URLs.

property.title: Sidebar to Left
property.description: Checked: sidebar to left Unchecked: sidebar to right. Not compatible with Canvas Panel Type > Sidebar.

property.title: Forum Node Style
property.description: Node grid layout is configured in the node tree and must be the same for all themes using Node grid layout.

property.title: Max Page Width
property.description: Pixels or percentages if not using width toggle. Recommended percentages: 80% - 100%. Must be set to pixels to use width toggle.

property.title: Logo Text
property.description: If empty, falls back on logo image on the server.

property.title: Remove Selected Tab Sub-Links
property.description: Turns the selected navigation tab into a drop-down menu.

property.title: Hide Node Controls
property.description: For hiding the RSS icon and other node controls.

property.title: Hide Last Post
property.description: Hide the last post on forum node.

property.title: Gutter Width
property.description: Space between large elements, in pixels

property.title: Google Fonts
property.description: Choose the fonts in which to load from Google Fonts API.

property.title: Remove Bottom Breadcrumb
property.description: Removes the breadcrumb at the bottom of the page.

property.title: Form Element Height
property.description: Height of inputs, selects, etc.

property.title: Primary Border
property.description: The style of border that is referenced by most elements.

property.title: Gutter Width Small
property.description: Space between small elements, in pixels

property.title: Show Node Stats Only On Hover
Extra CSS Template
property.description: Includes CSS-type Xenforo templates. Note: Do not include the .css extension. Separate multiple templates with commas without spaces.

property.title: Logo Icon Class
property.description: Adds an icon next to your logo, such as FontAwesome. ex: fa fa-book

property.title: Table Style Nodes
property.description: Adds borders around nodes like table. Will not correctly display for Node grid layout.

property.title: New Moderator Alert Balloon
property.description: Styles item counts with the alert class in the moderator tabs.

property.title: Primary Color
property.description: Generally used for high focus elements.

property.title: Secondary Color
property.description: Used for accents on elements.

property.title: Tertiary Color
property.description: Used for rare elements to be more eye catching.

property.title: Enable AD Styler
property.description: If supported by the theme, the AD Styler allows users to customize colors, patterns, and fonts on their theme. Note: its not supported in all themes.

property.title: Preset Group
property.description: The folder and AD Styler group name to the presets.

property.title: Enable AD Styler Swatches
property.description: If the AD Styler is on, you can show a panel of basic color swatches at the bottom.

property.title: Text Selection
property.description: When you select text, by clicking and dragging, this is how it will display.

property.title: Inline Category Node Descriptions
property.description: Displays category node descriptions next to category node titles.

property.title: Logo Image Width
property.description: For retina friendly logos, set to half the natural width of your logo image. Make logo image larger if necessary. Blank to show full size.

property.title: Show Extended Footer
property.description: Show an extended footer for adding descriptions and menus.

property.title: Remove Title from Forum Index
property.description: Removes the page title from the forum index.

property.title: Remove Content Wrapper
property.description: Removes padding, borders, and backgrounds from the content wrapper.

property.title: Separate Header from Content Wrapper
property.description: Adds margin-bottom to header, border-top to #content .pageContent.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Sidebar
property.description: Enables sidebar to be toggled on pages that have a sidebar. Not compatible with Canvas Panel Type > Sidebar.

property.title: Logo Block
property.description: Styles the logoBlock pageContent element.

property.title: Default Styler Preset
property.description: Enter the name of the default styler preset file minus the .si extension.

property.title: Default Title, Logo Font
property.description: Enter the value as you would the font CSS property. (e.g. normal 18pt 'Open Sans', sans-serif)

property.title: Default Title, Logo Font Source
property.description: Enter Google Fonts source. (e.g. 'Open+Sans:400,700' for Google Font's 'Open Sans')

property.title: Show Home Tab as Icon
property.description: Selecting this will replace the text 'Home' with a house icon.

property.title: Brandmark Image Path
property.description: Enter URL to a smaller logo.

property.title: Navigation Logo Image Width
property.description: The natural width of the logo or brandmark image in the navigation.

property.title: UI.X Version
property.description: Not for editing. Version of UI.X installed.

property.title: Add Button to the QuickSearch
property.description: Enabling this setting will add a functional submit button to the QuickSearch.

property.title: Viewport Width to Hide Styler
property.description: Maximum viewport width at which the styler does not load and does not display.

property.title: Enable AD Styler Presets
property.description: If the AD Styler is on, you can select preset skins from the styler.

property.title: Presets
property.description: A comma delimited list with no spaces after or before commas and not including the .si file extension, of all the presets in your preset folder.

property.title: Beta Mode
property.description: For development and bug-finding purposes. DO NOT enable on a live site.

property.title: Enable Welcome Section
property.description: Global on/off toggle for the welcome block section.

property.title: Welcome Section as Modal
property.description: Displays the welcome section as a modal.

property.title: Welcome Modal Opacity
property.description: Enter value from 0 to 1.

property.title: Enable Fixed Jump To Top
property.description: A jump to top link will appear that will follow you around so you can quickly go to the top of the page.

property.title: Styler Reset
property.description: Change this if you ever modify any Styler vars or .si files. The number is arbitrary. It will force everyone to delete their styler local storage.

property.title: Show Block Heading Icons
property.description: Headings will each have an icon next to the text. There is a default icon if one is not set in CSS.

property.title: Page Wrapper
property.description: Styles uix_wrapper when Wrapped Page Style is enabled.

property.title: Custom HTML Welcome Section
property.description: Check to display custom html welcome section found in template "uix_welcomeBlock_custom".

property.title: Visitor Tabs to User Bar
property.description: Moves the visitor tabs to the moderator bar for logged in users.

property.title: Sticky User Bar
property.description: Enabling this setting will, depending on the viewport parameters set in UI.X Header, have the user bar stick to the top of the browser viewport.

property.title: Sticky Navigation
property.description: Enabling this setting will, depending on the viewport parameters set in UI.X Header, have the main navigation stick to the top of the browser viewport.

property.title: Body Background Size
property.description: Values include cover, contain, etc.

property.title: Body Background Image Path
property.description: Enter path to background image.

property.title: Body Background Repeat
property.description: Enter the background-repeat property for the background image.

property.title: Viewport Width to Show Search Icon
property.description: Enter the maximum viewport width at which the search icon replaces the search bar. Enter 100% for always icon. Enter 0 for never.

property.title: Logo Block Width for Floated Logo
property.description: Sets the width of the logoBlock when floated to the left of navigation.

property.title: Enable Welcome Section on All Pages
property.description: Shows a welcome section on all pages, not just the forum index.

property.title: Hide Extended Footer Icons
property.description: Will hide the icons next to each column title.

property.title: Inline Navigation Alert Balloons
property.description: Instead of displaying like a balloon, alerts will display inline with the text.

property.title: Inline User Bar Alert Balloons
property.description: Instead of displaying like a balloon, alerts will display inline with the text.

property.title: Footer Menu Force Covered
property.description: Force the background of the footer menu to extend full width.

property.title: Extended Footer Force Covered
property.description: Force the background of the extended footer columns to extend full width.

property.title: Footer Legal Style
property.description: Styles the footer block typically containing the copyright information.

property.title: Copyright Force Covered
property.description: Force the background of the copyright to extend full width.

property.title: Custom Row Below Extended Footer
property.description: Edit template uix_extendedFooter_bottom to add custom HTML to the bottom.

property.title: Custom Row Above Extended Footer
property.description: Edit template uix_extendedFooter_top to add custom HTML to the top.

property.title: Custom Bottom Row Style
property.description: Styles the wrapper of the custom row added below the extended footer.

property.title: Custom Top Row Style
property.description: Styles the wrapper of the custom row added above the extended footer.

property.title: Landscape Viewport Width Upper Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is wider than it is tall. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Landscape Viewport Height Upper Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is wider than it is tall. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Mega Menu Style
property.description: Styles popup menus with the .uix_megaMenu class.

property.title: Set Last Node to 50% Width
property.description: Works for Side by side nodes and Side by side category nodes. Will not work with Node grid layout.

property.title: Use Collapsible Sidebar Phrases
property.description: To be explicit you can opt to show the open and close phrases next to the collapse sidebar trigger.

property.title: Condense Visitor Tabs
property.description: Removes all visitor tabs except the account tab. Inbox and notification item counts are shown on the account tab.

property.title: Show Brandmark Image in Navigation
property.description: Shows on navigation style 2 and in the sticky navigation.

property.title: Classic Postbit
property.description: Places the user block above the content in a postbit.

property.title: Font Awesome Path
property.description: To load locally, enter @imagePath/uix/css/font-awesome.min.css

property.title: [Deprecated] Off-Canvas Panel Breakpoint
property.description: This style property is deprecated. Use the Left Panel Breakpoint and Right Panel Breakpoint style properties instead.

property.title: Breadcrumb Separator Icons
property.description: Separate breadcrumb items with an icon.

property.title: Panel
property.description: The wrapper for individual off-canvas side panels.

property.title: Nav Panel Top-Link
property.description: Top level links in navigation type side panels.

property.title: Nav Panel Sub-Link
property.description: Lower level links in navigation type side panels. These links are collapsed under top level links.

property.title: Sticky Sidebar
property.description: Enabling this setting will, depending on the viewport parameters set in UI.X Header, have the sidebar stick to the top of the browser viewport. Not compatible with Canvas Panel Type > Sidebar.

property.title: Landscape Viewport Width Lower Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is wider than it is tall. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Landscape Viewport Height Lower Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is wider than it is tall. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Enable Node Icons as Glyphs
property.description: Use your favorite font or glyph icon set. For FontAwesome, an example could be "fa fa-folder".

property.title: Category Strip Icons
property.description: Useful if you want to add an icon per category strip or just have a general marker.

property.title: Page Nav Height
property.description: The height of page nav or pagination buttons.

property.title: Plain Message Controls
property.description: Scrubs the message controls of their button-like appearance.

property.title: Preview Advertisement Templates
property.description: Previews advertisement templates for admins only.

property.title: Remove Content Advertisement Wrappers
property.description: Removes wrappers from advertisements appearing in the content section.

property.title: Header White Space
property.description: Pixel value of the margin between navigation, user bar, and logo block

property.title: Center Advertisments
property.description: Centers advertisements appearing in all templates prefixed by "ad_"

property.title: Remove Sidebar Advertisement Wrappers
property.description: Removes wrappers from advertisements appearing in the sidebar and profile mast.

property.title: Posbit Avatar Size
property.description: The size will be forced to fit inside the space provided so you'll want to edit User Info Container (@messageUserInfo) width to make the space wider or thinner.

property.title: Viewport Width for Centered Logo
property.description: Pixel value of the viewport width at which to center logo and ad_header sections. 0 is never centered. 100% is always centered.

property.title: Enable Circular Online Marker
property.description: The online indicator will display as a circle instead of the default triangle.

property.title: Circular Online Marker
property.description: These styles are applied when Enable Circular Online Marker is checked.

property.title: Enable Online Marker Pulsate Effect
property.description: When you have the circular online marker enabled, this will add a pulsate effect around the marker.

property.title: Fade Fixed Jump Buttons
property.description: This will fade out the jump to top icon when you have stopped scrolling.

property.title: New Indicator Label
property.description: Will display a new indicator next to the node title if there is new content. Great if you want to remove node icons to consolidate space.

property.title: Category Description as Tooltips
property.description: Will display the description as a tooltip on hover.

property.title: Private Controls Breakpoint
property.description: Pixel value of the viewport width at which the private message controls display in a drop-down. Enter 0 to never display as a drop-down. Enter 100% to always display as a drop-down.

property.title: Hide Footer Menu
property.description: Hides the home, privacy policy, etc. so you can use the menu in a different location.

property.title: Centered Controls Breakpoint
property.description: This will center the message controls at a certain size. Leave 0 to never center or 100% to always center.

property.title: HTML5, CSS3, and Media Query support for IE8
property.description: This will add some much needed love for IE8. It won't fix all issues, but it should help make your theme work much better.

property.title: Enable Icon Font for Editor Toolbar Buttons
property.description: Replaces icons in the editor toolbar with icon font alternatives.

property.title: Show Account Avatar
property.description: Display the account tab avatar next to the username.

property.title: Viewport Width to Hide Account Tab Username
property.description: Pixel value of the viewport width at which to hide the username text. 0 is never hidden. 100% is always hidden.

property.title: Viewport Width for Collapsed Admin Menu
property.description: Pixel value of the viewport width at which the admin menu displays as a drop-down. Enter 0 to never display as a drop-down. Enter 100% to always display as a drop-down.

property.title: Insert Welcome Section Upon Closing Modal
property.description: When Welcome Section as Modal is enabled, inserts the welcome section into the content upon closing the modal.

property.title: Float User Banners Right
property.description: Floats user banners to the right for mobile or when Classic Postbit is enabled.

property.title: Enable Fixed Jump To Bottom
property.description: A jump to bottom link will appear that will follow you around so you can quickly go to thebottom of the page.

property.title: Global Show Sticky on Scroll Up Only
property.description: Enable this if you globally want sticky to show on scroll up only.

property.title: Minimum Height to Enable Sticky Scroll Up
property.description: Scrolling up will slide down sticky elements if the page is at least this many pixels down. Generally this should be larger than the height of your header.

property.title: Enable Post Pagination
property.description: Works best with sticky enabled for the containing element.

property.title: Post Pagination Progress Bar
property.description: Sets the style of the post pagination progress bar.

property.title: Stack Fixed Jump Buttons
property.description: As opposed to next to each other.

property.title: Post Pagination Offset
property.description: Will offset the top of where the post pagination will scroll to.

property.title: Sidebar Max Responsive Width
property.description: Page widths less than or equal to this will cause the sidebar to align below content and disable sticky sidebar and collapsing sidebar (if they are enabled). Not compatible with Canvas Panel Type > Sidebar.

property.title: Remove Selected Tab Sub-Links Sticky
property.description: Will remove TabLinks from sticky navigation only.

property.title: Show avatar of who last posted
property.description: Shows avatar in the last post section.

property.title: Thread Last Post Avatar
property.description: Styles the avatar of the last poster in a Thread List Item.

property.title: Enable Last Poster Avatar
property.description: Shows avatar in the last post block in thread list items.

property.title: Enable Sticky Footer
property.description: Enable this to stick the footer to the bottom if the document isn't taller than the window height.

property.title: Left Panel Type
property.description: If Sidebar is chosen and on-canvas is enabled, the trigger will show until the on-canvas shows. If Sidebar is chose and on-canvas is disabled, the trigger will always show.

property.title: Right Panel Type
property.description: If Sidebar is chosen and on-canvas is enabled, the trigger will show until the on-canvas shows. If Sidebar is chose and on-canvas is disabled, the trigger will always show.

property.title: Minimal Search Style Size
property.description: Must be less than or equal than Viewport Width to Show Search Icon (@uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth). Set to 0 to disable.

property.title: Column 1 Icon
property.description: Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use.

property.title: Column 2 Icon
property.description: Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use.

property.title: Column 3 Icon
property.description: Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use.

property.title: Column 4 Icon
property.description: Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use.

property.title: Size at which to center footer links
Node Info (grid layout)
property.description: Styles the nodeInfo class when the Node Grid Layout is enabled.

property.title: Show Home Crumb as Icon
property.description: Will replace the text for home with a house icon. Can be customized with CSS.

property.title: Remove Breadcrumb on Index
property.description: This removes the breadcrumb for the index page. See index page route in the options.

property.title: Disable Fixed Elements in Unsupported Mobile Browsers
property.description: Older mobile browsers and iOS third-party browsers don't allow updates to the DOM while scrolling. To improve experience, this disables Sticky and Jump To for older mobile browsers (iOS < 8, Android < 4) and iOS third-party browsers (e.g. iOS Chrome).

property.title: Responsive Message Breakpoint
property.description: Pixel value of viewport width at which the postbit changes for mobile devices.

property.title: Post Details
property.description: Styles the wrapper around the post number, edited by, and other post meta.

property.title: Post Number
property.description: Styles the post number.

property.title: Stretch Content Container
property.description: Matches heights of Content Container (@messageInfo) and User Info Container (@messageUserInfo). Applicable to the default postbit.

property.title: Show Trigger Phrases
property.description: Will add a menu phrase next to the off canvas trigger icon.

property.title: Remove Breadcrumb on Forum Index
property.description: This removes the breadcrumb for the forum list index page.

property.title: Welcome Section Glyph Icon
property.description: Enter the classes required for the icon you want to use. Leave blank to remove.

properties.property: Our community has been around for many years and pride ourselves on offering unbiased, critical discussion among people of all different backgrounds. We are working every day to make sure our community is one of the best.

• Home
  • About
  • Forums
  • Downloads
  • Contact

Open the Quick Navigation

The management works very hard to make sure the community is running the best software, best designs, and all the other bells and whistles. Care to buy us a beer? We'd really appreciate it!

Donate to us!
Wanting to join the rest of our members? Feel free to sign up today.

property.title: Node Info
property.description: Styles the nodeInfo class.

property.title: Move top control to content
property.description: This will move the call to action top control buttons out of the breadcrumb and into the main content area.

property.title: Enable Width Toggle
property.description: This setting will allow users to toggle the width of the forum from fixed to fluid or vice versa. Requires Max Page Width to be set in pixels.

property.title: Separate Sticky Threads
property.description: This will add headings above sticky threads and above normal threads to clearly differentiate the two types of threads.

property.title: Hide AD Styler Trigger
property.description: Hide the AD Styler trigger. Useful if wanting to only display color swatches.

property.title: Login Trigger Position
property.description: This setting allows you to move the location of the login trigger.

property.title: Login Trigger Style
property.description: The method in which the login form displays once the trigger is activated.

property.title: Enable Login Trigger Icons
property.description: Enable icons next to log in and sign up triggers.

property.title: Show Login Form in Sidebar
property.description: If enabled, a quick login form will be displayed to guests on the sidebar.

property.title: Use Style Property Values for Welcome Block
property.description: If disabled, values of welcome block settings are set in UI.X Options located in Appearances > UI.X > Options > [UI.X] Welcome Block.

property.title: Use Style Property Values for Extended Footer
property.description: If disabled, values of extended footer settings are set in UI.X Options located in Appearances > UI.X > Options > [UI.X] Footer.

property.title: Enable Visitor Panel Stats Icons
property.description: Display visitor panel stats as icons.

property.title: Enable Smart Border Radius JavaScript
property.description: Enables context-aware border-radius rules. Very helpful, especially in the header. Turning this off will save a small amount of load time. Disabling only recommended for non-rounded designs.

property.title: Include Javascript Functions Inside Templates
property.description: Enabling this setting will run relevant javascipt inside templates to prevent waiting for document.ready and reduce flashes of unstyled content

property.title: Portrait Viewport Height Lower Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is taller than it is wide. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Portrait Viewport Height Upper Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is taller than it is wide. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Portrait Viewport Width Lower Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is taller than it is wide. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Portrait Viewport Width Upper Bound for Sticky Elements
property.description: Only used when browser is taller than it is wide. Enter 0 for unbound.

property.title: Minimal Search Animation Speed
property.description: Time in seconds for the animation. ex) .3s

property.title: Show Dropdown Arrows
property.description: Will display icons for the arrows on dropdown menus.

property.title: Dropdown Arrow Size
property.description: Font size of dropdown arrows in pixels.

property.title: Sticky Navigation Tabs Container
property.description: Controls the container for the header navigation tabs when the navigation is sticky.

property.title: Enable Smart Header UL Javascript
property.description: Enables context-aware list item rules. Very helpful, especially in the header. Turning this off will save a small amount of load time. Disabling only recommended for non-rounded designs.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Sticky Threads
property.description: If enabled, users can opt to collapse sticky threads. They can be be automatically uncollapsed for users based on settings under Options > [UI.X] Thread List.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Avatar Holder
property.description: If enabled and given the correct permissions, avatars will be collapsed by default to consolidate message views. Not compatible with Classic Postbit.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Extra Info
property.description: If enabled and given the correct permissions, extra user info will be collapsed by default to consolidate message views. Not compatible with Classic Postbit.

property.title: Expand Collapsible User Info On Hover
property.description: As opposed to on click, hovering over the postbit information will trigger the sliding effect.

property.title: Javascript Path
property.description: The path to the theme's javascript directory relative to /js/audentio/ . Allows for multiple versions of UI.X and/or Audentio.com products to be installed and not share the same javascript functions. Only change this if you are certain you should be.

property.title: User Info Collapse Trigger
property.description: Styles the trigger for collapsible content in Message User Info.

property.title: Jump To Top Target
property.description: When the jump to top icon is clicked where should the browser go?

property.title: Jump To Bottom Target
property.description: When the jump to bottom icon is clicked where should the browser go?

property.title: Scroll Sticky Trigger Distance
property.description: Sets the minimum distance the page must scroll before scroll sticky slides in or out of view. Enter 0 to trigger immediately on scrolling the page.

property.title: Sub-Forum Titles
property.description: Styles Subforum titles.

property.title: Sub-Forum Titles, Unread
property.description: Styles unread sub-forum titles.

property.title: Backstretch Images
property.description: Enter a list of images where each image is wrapped in quotes. If you add multiple images, every line minus the last one should be followed by a comma. Ex: "image/bg1.jpg", "image/bg2.jpg"

property.title: Backstretch Selector
property.description: Default value is to leave this field empty.

property.title: Backstretch Duration
property.description: Duration in milliseconds (4000 = 4 seconds) of the time between image fades.

property.title: Backstretch Fade
property.description: Duration in milliseconds (500 = .5 seconds) of the time it takes to perform the fade effect.

property.title: Avatar Shape
property.description: Change small avatars around the forum to visually crop into a specific shape.

property.title: Browser Theme Color
property.description: A meta tag with a color value, will set the address bar background color in certain browsers. (such as Chrome on Lollipop)

property.title: Message Signature Max Height
property.description: Set to 0 to always collapse signatures. Otherwise will specify a maximum height for signatures and a toggle to expand to their full height.

property.title: Abridged Signature Trigger
property.description: Styles the trigger for abridged Signatures.

property.title: Expand Abridged Signatures On Hover
property.description: Expand abridged signatures by hovering over the signature, as opposed to on clicking on the toggle.

property.title: Hide Abridged Signature Hints On Non-Touch Devices
property.description: This hides the abridged signature hints on devices that don't support touch input. Only works if hover is enabled and the min height is at least 20px.

property.title: Prevent Always Sticky
property.description: If enabled, items touching the top of the screen will not be sticky when scrolled to the very top of the page.

property.title: Enable relative time
property.description: Enabling this feature will show time responses to the second and in a shortened format. Disabling will trump the below time settings in one go.

property.title: Enable Relative Time on Node Last Posts
Enable Relative Time on Thread Last Posts
Enable Relative Time on Thread Creation Date
Enable Relative Time for Post Date
Enable Relative Time on Last Activity
Enable Relative Time on Register Date
Floating Container
property.description: The container for floating notices. Used for layout -- margins,width, etc.

property.title: Panel Animation Type
property.description: Animation type for off-canvas panels.

property.title: Navigation Tab Icon Size
property.description: Font size of Navigation Tab Icons

property.title: Enable Off-Canvas Panel Support for IE8
property.description: Adds fallback CSS for browsers that don't support CSS transforms.

property.title: Category Node Icons
property.description: Styles category strip node icons if they're enabled.

property.title: Display Left Panel On-Canvas
property.description: Advanced feature. Show left side panel on-canvas above the specified breakpoint.

property.title: Display Right Panel On-Canvas
property.description: Show right side panel on-canvas above the specified breakpoint.

property.title: On-Canvas Left Panel Breakpoint
property.description: Advanced feature. Minimum device width to show left side panel on-canvas. Value must be greater than or equal to Left Panel Trigger Breakpoint. Enter pixel value with units.

property.title: Panel Link
property.description: Generic links in off-canvas side panels.

property.title: Panel Link, Hover
property.description: Hover state for generic links in off-canvas side panels.

property.title: On-Canvas Right Panel Breakpoint
property.description: Advanced feature. Minimum device width to show right side panel on-canvas. Value must be greater than or equal to Right Panel Trigger Breakpoint. Enter pixel value with units.

property.title: Left Panel Trigger Breakpoint
property.description: Maximum device width to show the left side panel trigger. Enter pixel value with units. Enter 100% to always show the trigger.

property.title: Right Panel Trigger Breakpoint
property.description: Maximum device width to show the right side panel trigger. Enter pixel value with units. Enter 100% to always show the trigger.

property.title: Panel Animation Duration
property.description: Duration of panel animation. Enter a value in milliseconds with units. 300ms is recommended.

property.title: Welcome Modal Position
property.description: Enter 0 for left, 1 for right

property.title: Fixed Jump Button Location
property.description: Location to show the fixed jump button. Enter 0 for left and 1 for right.

property.title: Position For Floating Notices
property.description: Enter 0 for left and 1 for right.

property.title: Panel Tab
property.description: Styles tab anchors found in panels such as the account, conversation, and notification tabs found in the visitor side panel.

property.title: Panel Tab, Active
property.description: Styles the active panel tab found in the visitor side panel.

property.title: Panel Heading
property.description: Styles text headings inside of side panels.

property.title: Panel Block Link
property.description: Styles links in block link lists in the sidebar.

property.title: Panel Media Object
property.description: Media objects in side panels. Reference individual notification and conversation objects in the vistor's off-canvas side panel.

property.title: Thread List Separator
property.description: Subheading separating sticky and normal threads.

property.title: Dropdown Menu Animation Speed
property.description: Speed in ms. XenForo default is 50. Some dropdown menu animations happen instantly regardless of this setting.

property.title: Page Wrapper, Responsive
property.description: Styles to apply to uix_wrapper below the specified device width.

property.title: Page Wrapper Breakpoint
property.description: Device width at which Responsive Page Wrapper styles apply when UI.X Page Style is set to Wrapped Style.

property.title: Logo Text Breakpoint
property.description: The device width under which the logo text changes font-size. Enter a pixel value with units.

property.title: Navigation Logo Text Breakpoint
property.description: The device width under which the Navigation Logo Text changes font-size. Enter a pixel value with units.

property.title: Tags
property.description: Styles tags.

property.title: Tags, Hover
property.description: Styles tags on hover.

property.title: Delay Sticky Sidebar Initialization
property.description: If enabled, the sticky sidebar will sticky after images have loaded into the page, useful to stop images loading in from allowing the sticky sidebar to overrun its bounds.

property.title: Show Welcome Section on Forum List
property.description: This will display the welcome section on the forum list page.

property.title: Enable node styling
property.description: If enabled, any changes you make to the node tree node options, such as colors, backgrounds, font changes, etc. will be applied to this theme.

property.title: Sidebar Block
property.description: Styles sidebar blocks. (.sidebar .section .secondaryContent)

group.title: └ [UI.X] AD Styler

group.title: ├ [UI.X] Threads

<xen:edithint template="message_user_info.css" />

.messageList
{
	{xen:property messageList}
}

.messageList .message
{
    margin: 16px auto;
    background-color: rgb(253, 253, 253);
    padding: 8px;
    border: 1px solid rgb(226, 226, 226);
    border-radius: 4px;
}

{xen:helper clearfix, '.messageList .message'}

/*** Message block ***/

.message .messageInfo
{
	{xen:property messageInfo}
	zoom: 1;
}

	.message .newIndicator
	{
		{xen:property messageNewIndicator}
		
		<xen:comment> margin-right: -{xen:calc '{xen:property content.padding-right} + 5'}px; </xen:comment>
	}
		<xen:comment>
		.message .newIndicator span
		{
			{xen:property messageNewIndicatorInner}
		}
		</xen:comment>

	.message .messageContent
	{
		{xen:property messageContent}
	}
	
	.message .messageTextEndMarker
	{
		height: 0;
		font-size: 0;
		overflow; hidden;
	}
	
	.message .editDate
	{
		text-align: right;
		margin-top: 5px;
		font-size: 11px;
		color: {xen:property mutedTextColor};
	}

	.message .signature
	{
		{xen:property messageSignature}
	}
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_signatureHidingEnabled} && {$xenOptions.uix_enableCollapseSignature}">
	
		.hasJs .uix_signature { pointer-events: none; }
		
		.signature.uix_signatureExpanded .uix_signature { pointer-events: auto; }	
		
		.uix_signatureWrapperInner {
			position: relative;
			max-height: {xen:number {xen:property uix_signatureMaxHeight}}px;
			transition: max-height 0.3s ease-in-out;
			overflow-y: hidden;
		}
		
		.NoJs .uix_signatureWrapperInner { max-height: none; }
		
		.signature.is-notCollapsible .uix_signatureWrapperInner { max-height: none; }
		
		.uix_signatureToggle {
			{xen:property uix_signatureExpandStyle}
			
			cursor: pointer;
			
			<xen:comment> push to layer above the signature cover </xen:comment>
			position: relative;
			z-index: 1;
		}
		
		.NoJs .uix_signatureToggle { display: none; }
		
		.signature.is-notCollapsible .uix_signatureToggle { display: none; }
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:number {xen:property uix_signatureMaxHeight}} > 0 && {xen:property uix_signatureTriggerHide} && {xen:property uix_signatureHoverEnabled}">
			.NoTouch .uix_signatureToggle { display: none; }
		</xen:if>
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_signatureHoverEnabled}">
			.NoTouch .uix_signatureToggle { pointer-events: none; }
		</xen:if>
		
		.uix_signatureExpand { display: inline; }
		
		.signature.uix_signatureExpanded .uix_signatureExpand { display: none; }
		
		.uix_signatureCollapse { display: none; }
		
		.signature.uix_signatureExpanded .uix_signatureCollapse { display: inline; }
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_signatureHoverEnabled}">
		
			.NoTouch .uix_signatureCollapse__phrase--click { display: none; }
			
			.NoTouch .uix_signatureExpand__phrase--click { display: none; }
			
			.Touch .uix_signatureCollapse__phrase--hover { display: none; }
			
			.Touch .uix_signatureExpand__phrase--hover { display: none; }
		
		<xen:else />
		
			.uix_signatureCollapse__phrase--hover { display: none; }
			
			.uix_signatureExpand__phrase--hover { display: none; }
		
		</xen:if>
		
		
		.uix_signatureCover {		
			display: none; 
			opacity: 0;
			-webkit-transition: opacity 0.3s ease-out;
			transition: opacity 0.3s ease-out;
			box-sizing: border-box;
			position: absolute;
			bottom: 0;
			left: 0;
			right: 0;
			padding-top: {xen:calc '{xen:number {xen:property uix_signatureMaxHeight}} / 3'}px;
			text-align: center;
			
			background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, {xen:helper rgba, {xen:property message.background-color}, 0} 0%, {xen:helper unrgba, {xen:property message.background-color}} 80%);
			background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, {xen:helper rgba, {xen:property message.background-color}, 0} 0%, {xen:helper unrgba, {xen:property message.background-color}} 80%);
			background: -o-linear-gradient(top, {xen:helper rgba, {xen:property message.background-color}, 0} 0%, {xen:helper unrgba, {xen:property message.background-color}} 80%);
			background: linear-gradient(to bottom, {xen:helper rgba, {xen:property message.background-color}, 0} 0%, {xen:helper unrgba, {xen:property message.background-color}} 80%);
		}
		
		.signature.uix_show .uix_signatureCover { display: block; }
		
		.signature.uix_signatureExpanded.uix_show .uix_signatureCover {	display: block; }
		
		.signature.uix_signatureCut .uix_signatureCover
		{
			display: block;
			opacity: 1;
		}
			
		.signature.uix_signatureExpanded .uix_signatureCover
		{
			display: none;
			opacity: 0;
		}
		
		.NoJs .uix_signatureCover { display: none !important; }
		
		.signature.is-notCollapsible .uix_signatureCover { display: none !important; }
		
	</xen:if>

	.message .messageMeta
	{
		{xen:property messageMeta}
	}

		.message .privateControls
		{
			{xen:property messagePrivateControls}
		}

		.message .publicControls
		{
			{xen:property messagePublicControls}
		}
		
			.message .privateControls .item
			{
				margin-right: 10px;
				float: left;
			}

				.message .privateControls .item:last-child
				{
					margin-right: 0;
				}

			.message .publicControls .item
			{
				margin-left: 10px;
				float: left;
			}
	
				.message .messageMeta .control
				{
					{xen:property messageMetaControl}
				}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:focus
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlFocus}
					}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:hover
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlHover}
					}
				
					.message .messageMeta .control:active
					{
						{xen:property messageMetaControlActive}
					}
	/*** multiquote +/- ***/
		
	<xen:comment>	
	.message .publicControls .MultiQuoteControl
	{
		padding-left: 4px;
		padding-right: 4px;
		border-radius: 2px;
		margin-left: 6px;
		margin-right: -4px;
	}
	
	
	.message .publicControls .MultiQuoteControl.active
	{
		background-color: {xen:property primaryLighterStill};
	}
	</xen:comment>	
	
	<xen:include template="message_notices.css" />
	
	.message .likesSummary
	{
		{xen:property messageLikesSummary}
	}
	
	.message .messageText > *:first-child
	{
		margin-top: 0;
	}

/* inline moderation changes */

.InlineModChecked .messageUserBlock,
.InlineModChecked .messageInfo,
.InlineModChecked .messageNotices,
.InlineModChecked .bbCodeBlock .type,
.InlineModChecked .bbCodeBlock blockquote,
.InlineModChecked .attachedFiles .attachedFilesHeader,
.InlineModChecked .attachedFiles .attachmentList
{
	{xen:property inlineModChecked}
}

.InlineModChecked .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder,
.InlineModChecked .messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo
{
	background: transparent;
}

.InlineModChecked .messageUserBlock .arrow span
{
	border-left-color: {xen:property inlineMod};
}

/* message list */

.messageList .newMessagesNotice
{
	margin: 10px auto;
	padding: 5px 10px;
	border-radius: 5px;
	border: 1px solid {xen:property primaryLighter};
	background: {xen:property primaryLighterStill} url({xen:property imagePath}/xenforo/gradients/category-23px-light.png) repeat-x top;
	font-size: 11px;
}

/* deleted / ignored message placeholder */

.messageList .message.placeholder
{
}

.messageList .placeholder .placeholderContent
{	
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
	color: {xen:property primaryLightish};
	font-size: 11px;
}

	.messageList .placeholder a.avatar
	{
		float: left;
		display: block;
	}
	
		.messageList .placeholder a.avatar img
		{
			display: block;
			width: 32px;
			height: 32px;
		}
	<xen:comment>	
	.messageList .placeholder .privateControls
	{
		margin-top: -5px;
	}
	</xen:comment>

/* messages remaining link */

.postsRemaining a,
a.postsRemaining
{
	font-size: 11px;
	color: {xen:property mutedTextColor};
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	.Responsive .message .newIndicator
	{
		margin-right: 0;
		border-top-right-radius: {xen:property messageNewIndicator.border-top-left-radius};
	}
	
		.Responsive .message .newIndicator span
		{
			display: none;
		}
}

@media (max-width:{xen:property uix_responsiveMessageBreakpoint})
{
	.Responsive .message .messageInfo
	{
		margin-left: 0;
		padding: 0 10px;
	}

	.Responsive .message .messageContent
	{
		min-height: 0;
	}	
	<xen:comment>
	.Responsive .message .newIndicator
	{
		margin-right: -5px;
		margin-top: -16px;
	}
	</xen:comment>

	.Responsive .message .postNumber,
	.Responsive .message .authorEnd
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .message .signature
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .messageList .placeholder a.avatar
	{
		margin-right: 10px;
	}
}
</xen:if>

<xen:include template="header.css" />

<xen:include template="footer.css" />

<xen:include template="breadcrumb.css" />

<xen:include template="navigation.css" />

<xen:include template="search_bar.css" />

/** move the header to the top again **/

#headerMover
{
	zoom: 1;
}

	#headerMover #headerProxy
	{
		{xen:property header.background}
		height: {xen:calc '{xen:property headerLogoHeight} + {xen:property headerTabHeight} * 2 + 2'}px; /* +2 borders */
	}

	#headerMover #header
	{
		width: 100%;
		position: absolute;
		top: 0px;
		left: 0px;
	}


/** Generic page containers **/

.pageWidth
{
	{xen:property pageWidth}
}

.NoResponsive body
{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property nonResponsiveMinWidth}">min-width: {xen:property nonResponsiveMinWidth};</xen:if>
}

#content .pageContent
{
	{xen:property content}
}

{xen:helper clearfix, '#content .pageContent'}

<xen:include template="sidebar.css" />

/** Text used in message bodies **/

.messageText
{
	{xen:property messageText}
}

	.messageText img,
	.messageText iframe,
	.messageText object,
	.messageText embed
	{
		max-width: 100%;
	}

/** Link groups and pagenav container **/

.pageNavLinkGroup
{
	display: table;
	*zoom: 1;
	table-layout: fixed;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	
	{xen:property pageNavLinkGroup}
}

opera:-o-prefocus, .pageNavLinkGroup
{
	display: block;
	overflow: hidden;
}

	.pageNavLinkGroup:after
	{
		content: ". .";
		display: block;
		word-spacing: 99in;
		overflow: hidden;
		height: 0;
		font-size: 0.13em;
		line-height: 0;
	}

	.pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup
	{
		float: right;
	}

.linkGroup
{
}
	
	.linkGroup a
	{
		{xen:property linkGroupLink}
	}

		.linkGroup a.inline
		{
			padding: 0;
		}

	.linkGroup a,
	.linkGroup .Popup,
	.linkGroup .element
	{
		margin-left: {xen:property linkGroupLinkSpacing};
		display: block;
		float: left;
		<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">*display: inline; *float: none; *zoom: 1;</xen:if>
	}
	
		.linkGroup .Popup a
		{
			margin-left: -2px;
			margin-right: -5px;
			*margin-left: {xen:property linkGroupLinkSpacing};
			padding: {xen:property linkGroupLink.padding-top} 5px;
		}

	.linkGroup .element
	{
		padding: 3px 0;
	}

/** Call to action buttons **/

a.callToAction
{
	{xen:property callToAction}
	
}

	a.callToAction span
	{
		{xen:property callToActionSpan}
	}
	
	a.callToAction:hover
	{
		text-decoration: none;
	}

		a.callToAction:hover span
		{
			{xen:property callToActionHover}
		}
		
		a.callToAction:active
		{
			/*position: relative;
			top: 2px;*/
		}
		
		a.callToAction:active span
		{
			{xen:property callToActionActive}
		}

/*********/

.avatarHeap
{
	overflow: hidden; zoom: 1;
}

	.avatarHeap ol
	{

.tagBlock
{
	margin: 10px 0;
	font-size: 11px;
}

.tagList,
.tagList li
{
	display: inline;
}


.tagList .tag
{
	{xen:property uix_tags}
}

	.tagList .tag:hover
	{
		{xen:property uix_tagsHover}
	}

	.tagList .tag .arrow
	{
		position: absolute;
		display: block;
		/* height: 2px; */
		height: 0;
		width: 0;
		left: -9px;
		left: -{xen:property uix_tags.margin-left};
		top: -1px;
		top: -{xen:property uix_tags.border-top-width};
		border-style: solid;
		border-width: 8px 9px 8px 0;
		border-width: {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_tags.height} + {xen:property uix_tags.border-top-width} + {xen:property uix_tags.border-bottom-width}) / 2'}px {xen:property uix_tags.margin-left} {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_tags.height} + {xen:property uix_tags.border-top-width} + {xen:property uix_tags.border-bottom-width}) / 2'}px 0;
		border-color: transparent;
		border-right-color: {xen:property primaryLighter};
		border-right-color: {xen:property uix_tags.border-color};
	}

		.tagList .tag .arrow:after
		{
			content: '';
			position: absolute;
			display: block;
			/* height: 2px; */
			height: 0;
			width: 0;
			left: 1px;
			left: -{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.margin-left} - 2 * {xen:property uix_tags.border-width}'}px;
			top: -7px;
			top: -{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.height} / 2'}px;
			border-style: solid;
			border-width: 7px 8px 7px 0;
			border-width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.height} / 2'}px {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.margin-left} - {xen:property uix_tags.border-width}'}px {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.height} / 2'}px;
			border-color: transparent;
			border-right-color: {xen:property primaryLightest};
			border-right-color: {xen:property uix_tags.background-color};
		}

		.tagList .tag:hover .arrow:after
		{
			border-right-color: {xen:property primaryLighterStill};
			border-right-color: {xen:property uix_tagsHover.background-color};
		}

	.tagList .tag:after
	{
		content: '';
		position: absolute;
		left: -2px;
		top: 6px;
		top: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tags.height} / 2 - 2.5'}px;
		display: block;
		height: 3px;
		width: 3px;
		border-radius: 50%;
		border: 1px solid {xen:property uix_tags.border-color};
		background: {xen:property contentBackground};
	}

<xen:set var="$uix_fixedNavigationHeight_outer">{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight} + {xen:property uix_fixedNavigation_style.border-top-width} + {xen:property uix_fixedNavigation_style.border-bottom-width} + {xen:property uix_fixedNavigation_style.padding-top} + {xen:property uix_fixedNavigation_style.padding-bottom}'}</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$uix_tabLinksHeight_outer">{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight} + {xen:property uix_tabLinks_style.padding-top} + {xen:property uix_tabLinks_style.padding-bottom} + {xen:property uix_tabLinks_style.border-bottom-width} + {xen:property uix_tabLinks_style.border-top-width}'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$uix_tabLinksHeightSticky_outer">{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky} + {xen:property uix_tabLinksSticky_style.padding-top} + {xen:property uix_tabLinksSticky_style.padding-bottom} + {xen:property uix_tabLinksSticky_style.border-bottom-width} + {xen:property uix_tabLinksSticky_style.border-top-width}'}</xen:set>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 2">


	/*** UIX -- PAGE STYLES -- WRAPPED ***/

	#uix_wrapper {		
		{xen:property uix_pageStyle2_style}
		
		padding-top: {xen:property pageWidth.padding-right};
		padding-top: {xen:property pageWidth.padding-right};	
	}
	
	#uix_wrapper .pageWidth { max-width: none; }	
	
	html.is-fullWidth #uix_wrapper .activeSticky .pageWidth { max-width: 100%; }
		
	html.is-setWidth #uix_wrapper .activeSticky .pageWidth { max-width: {xen:property uix_pageWidth}; }
	
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_widthToggle}">

	/*** UIX -- PAGE WIDTH ***/
	
	.pageWidth {
		-o-transition: max-width .4s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.27, 1.55);
		-moz-transition: max-width .4s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.27, 1.55);
		-webkit-transition: max-width .4s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.27, 1.55);
		transition: max-width .4s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.27, 1.55);
	}
	
	html.is-fullWidth .pageWidth { max-width: 100%; }
		
	html.is-setWidth .pageWidth { max-width: {xen:property uix_pageWidth}; }
	
	html.is-fullWidth .Menu.uix_megaMenu { max-width: 100%; }
		
	html.is-setWidth .Menu.uix_megaMenu { max-width: {xen:property uix_pageWidth}; }	
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageWidth} > 100">
		<xen:set var="$setWidthToggleBreakpoint" value="{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_pageWidth} + {xen:property pageWidth.padding-left} + {xen:property pageWidth.padding-right}'}px"/> 
	<xen:else />
		<xen:set var="$setWidthToggleBreakpoint" value="{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}"/>
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:comment> -- KC, now using JS for element query
	@media (max-width: {$setWidthToggleBreakpoint}) { 
		html.is-setWidth .chooser_widthToggle { display: none !important; }
	}
	
	@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) { 
		html.is-fullWidth .chooser_widthToggle { display: none !important; }
	}
	</xen:comment>	

</xen:if>

.header__blockItem:last-of-type { margin-bottom: 0; }

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 0 && ({xen:property uix_headerWhiteSpace} > 0)">

	@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) and (min-width: {xen:calc '{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth} + 1'}px) {	
	
		.header__blockItem:first-child { margin-top: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveWide.margin-left}; }
	}
	
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 2">

	.header__blockItem:first-child { margin-top: 0; }
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_navStyle} == 3 && !{xen:property uix_userBarLocation} == 0">
	
		.header__blockItem#navigation { margin-top: 0; }
		
	</xen:if>

</xen:if>

@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
	
	.Responsive .header__blockItem { margin: 0; }
}

<xen:if is="( {xen:property uix_detachedNavigation} || {xen:property uix_removeContentWrapper} )">

	#content { margin-top: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth}; }
	
</xen:if>



<xen:comment>
/******************************************** 
************ NAVIGATION STUFF ************ 
********************************************/ 
</xen:comment>


<xen:comment> EDGE CASE FIX -- "EMPTY" VISITOR TABS BREAK RESPONSIVE NAVIGATION FUNCTION </xen:comment>

#navigation .visitorTabs {
    min-width: 1px;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 1">{xen:helper clearfix, '#navigation.withSearch .navTabs .pageWidth'}</xen:if>


#AccountMenu {width: 288px;}
ul.col1.blockLinksList, ul.col2.blockLinksList  {width: 50%;}
#AccountMenu .menuColumns a, #AccountMenu .menuColumns label {width: auto;}

.navTabs .navLink .itemCount.Zero {
	display: none !important;
}

.xenForm .checkboxColumns.blockLinksList > dd > ul li, 
ul.checkboxColumns.blockLinksList li {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.Menu.uix_megaMenu {
	max-width: {xen:property uix_pageWidth};
	width: 100%;
	left: 0 !important;
	right: 0;
	margin: 0 auto;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	{xen:property uix_megaMenu_style}
}

#headerMover #header {
	position: static;
	width: auto;
}

#headerMover #headerProxy {
	display: none;
	height: 0;
}
	
<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} != 1 && {xen:property navTabs.border-width}">

	html:not(.activeSmallLogo) .navTabs ul.left .navTab:first-child .navLink 
	{
		border-left-width: 0;
	}
	.navTabs ul.right .navTab:last-child .navLink 
	{
		border-right-width: 0; <xen:comment> MAY DEPEND ON WHETHER SEARCH IS IN NAVIGATION </xen:comment>
	}

</xen:if>




<xen:comment> NAVLINKS </xen:comment>

.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink { color: {xen:property navLink.color}; }

	<xen:comment> HOVER STATE </xen:comment>

	.navTabs .navTab:hover,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover {
		{xen:property uix_navLinkHover}
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab:hover .navLink,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .navLink,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .SplitCtrl { color: inherit; }



	<xen:comment> OPEN STATE </xen:comment>

	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupOpen,
	.navTabs .navTab.selected.PopupOpen .navLink {
		{xen:property uix_navTabOpen}
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupOpen .navLink,
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupOpen .SplitCtrl { color: inherit; }


	<xen:comment> SELECTED TAB </xen:comment>
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink, 
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed.selected .navLink,
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed.selected .SplitCtrl { color: {xen:property navTabSelected.color}; }
	
	.hasTabLinks #navigation .navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink { border-bottom-color: {xen:property navTabSelected.background-color}; }

	.navTabs .moderatorTabs .uix_icon { opacity: 0.5; }
	
<xen:comment> NAVIGATION POPUP CONTROLS </xen:comment>
<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_navDropdownArrows}">
	.navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		font-family: FontAwesome !important;
		font-weight: normal !important;
		font-style: normal !important;
		text-rendering: auto;
		-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
		-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
		transform: translate(0, 0);
		
		font-size: {xen:property uix_dropdownFontSize};
		
		margin-left: -{xen:calc '{xen:property navLink.padding-right} + {xen:property uix_dropdownFontSize}'}px;
	}
	
	.navTabs .SplitCtrl,
	#userBar .navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		width: 1em;
		border: none !important;
		padding-left: 0 !important;
		padding-right: 0 !important;
		margin-right: 0 !important;
		background: none !important;
	}
	
	#userBar .navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		margin-left: -{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_userBarLink.padding-right} + {xen:property uix_dropdownFontSize}'}px;	
	}
	
	.navTabs .SplitCtrl:hover { text-decoration: none; }
	
	.navTabs .SplitCtrl:before {
		content: "\f0d7";
		display: block;
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup .navLink:not(.NoPopupGadget) { 
		padding-right: calc( .2em + {xen:calc '{xen:property navLink.padding-right} + {xen:property uix_dropdownFontSize}'}px ); 
	}
	
	#userBar .navTabs .navTab.Popup .navLink:not(.NoPopupGadget) { 
		padding-right: calc( .2em + {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_userBarLink.padding-right} + {xen:property uix_dropdownFontSize}'}px ); 
	}
	
	<xen:comment> OPEN STATE </xen:comment>
	
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupOpen .SplitCtrl:before { content: "\f0d8"; }

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}">
	
		.navTabs .navTab.selected .SplitCtrl { display: none; }
		
	</xen:if>
	
	
<xen:comment> NO NAVIGATION POPUP CONTROLS </xen:comment>
<xen:else />

	.navTabs .SplitCtrl { display: none; }
	
</xen:if>



<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}">

	#navigation .pageContent { height: {$headerTabHeight_outer}px; }
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink { position: static; }
	
<xen:else />

	.navTabs .publicTabs .navTab.selected.Popup .navLink { padding-right: {xen:property navLink.padding-right}; }

	#navigation.inactiveSticky.uix_noTabLinks .pageContent { height: {$headerTabHeight_outer}px; }

	#navigation .pageContent { height: {xen:calc '{$headerTabHeight_outer} + {$uix_tabLinksHeight_outer}'}px; }

	#navigation .navTabs {
		border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
		border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
	}
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks {
		top: {$headerTabHeight_outer}px;
		{xen:property uix_tabLinks_style}
		
		height: {$uix_tabLinksHeight_outer}px;
		line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
	}

	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li {
		padding-top: 0;
		max-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
		box-sizing: border-box; 
	}
		
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>Fix for ajax request update</xen:comment>

.navTabs .navTab.account .itemCount,
.navTabs .navTab.inbox .itemCount,
.navTabs .navTab.alerts .itemCount {
	{xen:property alertBalloon}
}

.Menu.uix_adminMenu .blockLinksList .itemCount.alert,
#userBar .navTabs .navTab.account .itemCount,
#userBar .navTabs .navTab.inbox .itemCount,
#userBar .navTabs .navTab.alerts .itemCount
{
	{xen:property uix_moderatorTabsAlert}
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_inlineAlertBalloon_navigation}">
	#navigation .navTabs .navLink {
		-webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d;
		transform-style: preserve-3d;
	}
	
	#navigation .navTabs .navLink .itemCount {
		{xen:property uix_inlineAlertBalloon_style}
	}
	#navigation .navTabs .navLink .itemCount .arrow 
	{
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>




<xen:comment>
/****************************************************************************************************/
/********** WELCOME BLOCK **********/
/****************************************************************************************************/
</xen:comment>

<xen:edithint template="uix_welcomeBlock.css" />






/********************************
POPUP ICON SWAP
********************************/

@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
	.Responsive .navigationSideBar .heading span:before {
		content: '\f0d7';
		font-family: 'FontAwesome';
	}
}

.Popup .arrowWidget:before {
	content: '\f0d7';
	font-family: 'FontAwesome';
}
.Popup .PopupOpen .arrowWidget:before {
	content: '\f0d8';
	font-family: 'FontAwesome';
}

.messageSimple { border-bottom: 1px solid {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color}; }

.messageSimpleList .placeholder .placeholderContent {background-image: none;}

<xen:include template="uix_account.css" />


.navigationSideBar {font-size: {xen:property sidebar.font-size};}
.navigationSideBar a:hover {
	background-image: none;
	color: {xen:property uix_primaryColor};
}
.navigationSideBar > ul {
	border: solid 1px {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color};
	border-width: 0 0 1px 1px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	background-color: {xen:property primaryContent.background-color};
}
.navigationSideBar > ul, 
.navigationSideBar > ul > li.section:last-child > ul > li:last-child,
.navigationSideBar > ul > li.section:last-child > ul > li:last-child a {border-bottom-left-radius: {xen:property uix_globalLargeBorderRadius};}

.navigationSideBar > ul.menuVisible, 
.navigationSideBar > ul.menuVisible > li.section:last-child > ul > li:last-child,
.navigationSideBar > ul.menuVisible > li.section:last-child > ul > li:last-child a {border-radius: 0 0 {xen:property uix_globalLargeBorderRadius} {xen:property uix_globalLargeBorderRadius};}


<xen:comment>
/********************************
START SEARCH
********************************/
</xen:comment>

<xen:include template="uix_search.css" />


<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_privateTabCondense}">
#VisitorExtraMenu_Counter {display: inline-block !important;}
#VisitorExtraMenu_Counter.Zero {display: none !important;}
</xen:if>

.pollBlock .question .questionText {color: {xen:property contentText};}
.pollResult .barContainer {border-color: {xen:property uix_tertiaryColor}; border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};}
.pollResult .bar {background: {xen:property uix_tertiaryColor};}

.eventList li,
html .searchResult {border-bottom: 1px solid {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color};}

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_moveTopCtrl}">
.topCtrl--inContent {margin-left: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};}
</xen:if>


<xen:comment>
/****************************************************************************************************/
/********** CONTENT LAYOUT **********/
/****************************************************************************************************/
</xen:comment>

{xen:helper clearfix, ".uix_contentFix"}


.uix_mainSidebar {
	-moz-transition: opacity 0.4s;
	-o-transition: opacity 0.4s;
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.4s;
	transition: opacity 0.4s;
}

.mainContainer .mainContent > *:first-child,
.mainContainer_noSidebar > *:first-child
{
	margin-top: 0;	
}

.mainContainer .mainContent > *:last-child,
.mainContainer_noSidebar > *:last-child
{
	margin-bottom: 0;
}


<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_removeContentWrapper}"> <xen:comment> CONTENT WRAPPER IS REMOVED </xen:comment>

	{xen:helper clearfix, ".mainContainer_noSidebar"}
	{xen:helper clearfix, ".mainContainer .mainContent"}
	
	#content .pageContent:after { content: none; }

	#content .pageContent {
		background-color: transparent; 
		padding: 0;
		margin: 0;
		margin-bottom: 1px; <xen:comment> .footer .pageContent border-radius function fix (who added this? --mc)</xen:comment>
		border: none;
		box-shadow: none;
		background-image: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive #content .pageContent {
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
	}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} != 2">
		.mainContainer .mainContent, 
		.mainContainer_noSidebar {
			{xen:property content}
		}
		
		@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) {
			.mainContainer .mainContent, 
			.mainContainer_noSidebar
			{
				padding-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property content.padding-left} / 2'}px;
				padding-right: {xen:calc '{xen:property content.padding-right} / 2'}px;
			}
		}
	
	</xen:if>
	
<xen:else /> <xen:comment> CONTENT WRAPPER IS PRESENT </xen:comment>

		#content .pageContent > *:first-child
		{
			margin-top: 0;	
		}
		#content .pageContent > *:last-child
		{
			margin-bottom: 0;	
		}
							
</xen:if>

<xen:include template="uix_overlay.css" />

<xen:include template="uix_userBar.css" />

<xen:comment>
/****************************************************************************************************/
/********** STICKY STUFF **********/
/****************************************************************************************************/
</xen:comment>


.uix_mainSidebar.sticky .inner_wrapper {
	-moz-transition: top 0.2s;
	-o-transition: top 0.2s;
	-webkit-transition: top 0.2s;
	transition: top 0.2s;
}


<xen:comment> XENFORO ASSIGNS Z-INDEX VALUE OF 52 TO #searchBar </xen:comment>

#navigation,
#userBar {
	position: relative;
}

#navigation.withSearch,
#userBar.withSearch {
	z-index: 52;
}

<xen:comment>Controls flash of unstyled content before js can properly format links from addons -- KC</xen:comment>
#userBar .moderatorTabs > a {
	visibility: hidden;
}



<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stickyNavigation} || {xen:property uix_stickyUserBar}">

	.sticky_wrapper {
		position: relative;
		
		transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
		-webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
		backface-visibility: hidden;
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stickyGlobalScrollUp}">
			-moz-transition: -moz-transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
			-o-transition: -o-transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
			-o-transition: transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
			
			-webkit-transition: -webkit-transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
			transition: -webkit-transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
			transition: transform .2s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		</xen:if>
	}
	
	.activeSticky .sticky_wrapper {
		position: fixed;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
	}
	
	<xen:comment> Z-INDEXING ON STICKY WRAPPER </xen:comment>
	
	#navigation.activeSticky,
	#userBar.activeSticky,
	.activeSticky .sticky_wrapper { z-index: 250; }
	
	<xen:comment> ORDER MATTERS HERE, .lastSticky TAKES PRECEDENCE OVER .withSearch </xen:comment>
	
	#navigation.activeSticky.withSearch,
	#userBar.activeSticky.withSearch,
	.activeSticky.withSearch .sticky_wrapper { z-index: 260; }
	
		#navigation.activeSticky.lastSticky,
		#userBar.activeSticky.lastSticky,
		.activeSticky.lastSticky .sticky_wrapper { z-index: 240; }

	/* style last sticky element with a box-shadow body.scrollNotTouchingTop*/ 
	.activeSticky.lastSticky .pageContent {
		box-shadow: 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
	}
	
	.activeSticky .navTabs .navLink .itemCount 
	{
		{xen:property uix_inlineAlertBalloon_style}
	}
	.activeSticky .navTabs .navLink .itemCount .arrow
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	<xen:comment> /************* STICKY NAVIGATION ***************/ </xen:comment>
	
	#navigation.activeSticky .navTabs .navLink,
	#navigation.activeSticky .navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
		line-height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
	}
	
	#navigation.activeSticky .navTabs {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
	
		{xen:property uix_fixedNavigation_style}
	}
	
	<xen:comment> /************* STICKY TABLINKS ***************/ </xen:comment>
	
	
	.activeSticky .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks {
		{xen:property uix_tabLinksSticky_style}
	
		height: {$uix_tabLinksHeightSticky_outer}px;
		line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky};
		top: {$uix_fixedNavigationHeight_outer}px;
		border-radius: 0;
	}
	
	.activeSticky .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li { max-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky}; }
	
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_removeTabLinksSticky}">
		.activeSticky.uix_hideSubElement .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks { display: none !important; }
	</xen:if>

	#navigation.activeSticky .pageContent {
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}">
			height: {$uix_fixedNavigationHeight_outer}px;
		<xen:else />
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_removeTabLinksSticky}">
				height: {$uix_fixedNavigationHeight_outer}px;
			<xen:else />
				height: {xen:calc '{$uix_fixedNavigationHeight_outer} + {$uix_tabLinksHeightSticky_outer}' }px;
			</xen:if>
		</xen:if>
	}
	
	<xen:comment> /********** STICKY USER BAR **********/ </xen:comment>
	
	#userBar.activeSticky .navTabs .navLink, 
	#userBar.activeSticky .navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
		line-height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
	}
	
	#userBar.activeSticky .navTabs {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
		
		{xen:property uix_fixedUserBar_style}
	}
	
</xen:if> 

<xen:comment>/********** END STICKY STUFF **********/</xen:comment>



<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_hideAccountUsername}">

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_hideAccountUsername} != '100%'">
		@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_hideAccountUsername}) {
			.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink .accountUsername {display: none !important;}
		}
	<xen:else />
		.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink .accountUsername {display: none !important;}
	</xen:if>
		
</xen:if>

.navTabs .navTab.account .avatar {
	float: left;
	margin-right: .4em;
	position: relative;
	top: 50%;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
}
	
.navTabs .navTab.account .avatar img {
	display: block;
	width: 20px;
	height: 20px;
	border: none;
	box-shadow: none;
}
	
.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink .accountUsername {
	display: inline-block;
	vertical-align: top;
	text-transform: none;
}

.navTabs .navTab.account .navLink {
	-webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d;
	transform-style: preserve-3d;
}

.PageNav .scrollable {width: {xen:calc '({xen:property pageNavLinkWidth} * 5) +  ({xen:property pageNavLinkSpacing} * 4)'}px;}


<xen:comment> These rules have been inserted into the selectors' respective style properties.
.PageNav,
.pageNavLinkGroup { line-height: {xen:property uix_pageNav_height}; }
</xen:comment>

.PageNav .scrollable { height: {xen:property uix_pageNav_height}; }

<xen:set var="$uix_pageNavItemLineHeight">{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_pageNav_height} - {xen:property pageNavItem.border-top-width} - {xen:property pageNavItem.border-bottom-width} - {xen:property pageNavItem.padding-top} - {xen:property pageNavItem.padding-bottom}'}</xen:set>

.PageNav a {
	max-height: {xen:property uix_pageNav_height};
	line-height: {xen:if '{$uix_pageNavItemLineHeight} > 0', '{$uix_pageNavItemLineHeight}px', '0'};
}

.PageNav a.text {
	padding-top: {xen:property pageNavItem.padding-top};
	padding-bottom: {xen:property pageNavItem.padding-bottom};
}

a.PageNavPrev, 
a.PageNavNext {
	padding: 0;
	line-height: {xen:property uix_pageNav_height};
}

.PageNav .pageNavHeader, 
.PageNav a, 
.PageNav .scrollable
{
	margin-bottom: {xen:property pageNavLinkSpacing};
}
.textWithCount.subHeading .text 
{
	color: {xen:property subHeading.color};
}
.button.spinBoxButton
{
	margin-left: 5px;
	min-width: {xen:property uix_formElementHeight};
}

.textCtrlWrap
{
	height: auto;
	text-indent: 0;
}
.textCtrl .prefix, 
.textCtrl .Popup
{
	height: {xen:property uix_formElementHeight};
	line-height: {xen:property uix_formElementHeight};
}
.textCtrlWrap input.textCtrl,
.textCtrlWrap input.textCtrl:focus,
.textCtrlWrap input.textCtrl.Focus {box-shadow: none !important;}

.xenForm fieldset + .ctrlUnit, 
.xenForm .formGroup + .ctrlUnit, 
.xenForm .submitUnit 
{
	border-top: none;
}
.xenForm fieldset, 
.xenForm .formGroup,
.dataTable tr.dataRow td
{
	border-color: {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color};
}
.larger.textHeading,
.xenForm .sectionHeader,
.larger.textHeading a,
.xenForm .sectionHeader a {color: {xen:property contentText}; }

.formPopup .controlsWrapper,
.thread_view .threadAlerts {background-image: none;}
.thread_view .threadAlerts {
	border: 1px solid {xen:property secondaryMedium};
	border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};
	background-image: none;
	background-color: {xen:property secondaryLight};
}
 
.thread_view .threadAlerts dt {color: {xen:property secondaryDark};}

<xen:include template="uix_socialMedia.css" />

<xen:include template="uix_logo.css" />

.avatarScaler img,
.xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatar img,
.xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatar .img,
.xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatarCropper 
{
	background-color: {xen:property avatar.background-color};
}
body .AvatarEditor .avatarOption 
{
	background: {xen:property secondaryLighter}; 
	border-color: {xen:property secondaryLight};
}

.xenOverlay .section.messageSimpleList .messageContent {padding-right: 42px;}


<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} != 1">
	.avatar img, 
	.avatar .img, 
	.avatarCropper 
	{
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} == 0">		<xen:comment>	  Circle	</xen:comment>
		border-radius: 100%;
	<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} == 2" />	<xen:comment>	  Diamond	</xen:comment>
		-webkit-clip-path: polygon(50% 0, 100% 50%, 50% 100%, 0 50%);
		clip-path: url(#diamond);
	<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} == 3" />	<xen:comment>	  Pentagon	</xen:comment>
		-webkit-clip-path: polygon(50% 0, 100% 38%, 80% 100%, 20% 100%, 0 38%);
		clip-path: url(#pentagon);
	<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} == 4" />	<xen:comment>	  Hexagon	</xen:comment>
		-webkit-clip-path: polygon(50% 0, 95% 25%, 95% 75%, 50% 100%, 5% 75%, 5% 25%);
		clip-path: url(#hexagon);
	<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_avatarShape} == 5" />	<xen:comment>	  Octagon	</xen:comment>
		-webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 50%, 15% 15%, 50% 0, 85% 15%, 100% 50%, 85% 85%, 50% 100%, 15% 85%);
		clip-path: url(#octogon);
	</xen:if>
	}

	.xenOverlay.memberCard .avatarCropper,
	.memberCard .avatarCropper .avatar img, 
	.memberCard .avatarCropper .avatar
	{
		border-radius: 0;
		-webkit-clip-path: none;
		clip-path: none;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
/****************************************************************************************************/
/********** UIX Post Pagination STYLES **********/
/****************************************************************************************************/
</xen:comment>
<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_postPagination}">

	.navTab.audentio_postPagination { position: relative; z-index: 50; }

	.audentio_postPagination a { color: inherit;}
	
	.audentio_postPagination .navLink:hover a, .audentio_postPagination a:hover { color: {xen:property uix_navLinkHover.color}; text-decoration: inherit; }
	
	.audentio_postPagination .progress-container {
		width: 100%;
		height: 2px;
		margin-top: -8px;
		border-radius: 2px;
		overflow: hidden;
		background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
		border: {xen:property uix_postPaginationBar.border-color} {xen:property uix_postPaginationBar.border-style} {xen:property uix_postPaginationBar.border-width};
	}
	
	.audentio_postPagination .PopupControl.PopupOpen,
	.audentio_postPagination .PopupControl:hover {background: none;}
	
	.audentio_postPagination .progress-bar {
		height: 2px;
		
		-moz-transition: width 0.3s ease;
		-o-transition: width 0.3s ease;
		-webkit-transition: width 0.3s ease;
		transition: width 0.3s ease;
		
		background-color: {xen:property uix_postPaginationBar.background-color};
	}
	
	<xen:comment> tbro </xen:comment>
	.audentio_postPagination .uix_paginationMenu {
		display: inline-block;
	}
	
	#navigation .audentio_postPagination .uix_paginationMenu {
		height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
	}
	
	#navigation.activeSticky .audentio_postPagination .uix_paginationMenu {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
	}
	
	#userBar .audentio_postPagination .uix_paginationMenu {
		height: {xen:property uix_userBarHeight};
	}
	
	#userBar.activeSticky .audentio_postPagination .uix_paginationMenu {
		height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
	}
	
	
	#audentio_postPaginationDropdown {
		border-top-color: {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color};
		border-top-width: 1px;
		<xen:comment>
		position: absolute;
		top: 100%;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
		padding: 10px;
		z-index: 1000;
		display: none;
		font-size: 14px;
		background-color: {xen:property contentBackground};
		background-color: {xen:property menu.background-color};
		border: 1px solid {xen:property uix_primaryBorder.border-color};
		border-radius: 0px;
		box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.175);
		background-clip: padding-box;
		
		
	
		/* when you add primaryContent you can remove this whole chunk */
		
		
		
		</xen:comment>
	}
	
	
	#audentio_postPaginationInput {
		margin: auto;
		height: 28px;
		font-size: 16px;
		text-align: center;
		width: 100%;
		max-width: 180px;
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
	}
	
</xen:if>
