<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_adStylerOn}">
	#styleit-wrapper .bgAuto {background-size: auto;}
	#styleit-wrapper .bgContain {background-size: contain;}
	
	.styleit-bgimage-options {width: 256px !important;}
	.styleit-bgimage-options > span:hover {-webkit-filter: brightness(.9) !important;}
	#styleit-wrapper {z-index: 99999;}
	#styleit-wrapper * {box-sizing: border-box;}
	.colorpicker {z-index: 999999 !important;}
	#styleit-wrapper .styleit-logo span {color: #ADCDEC;}
	#styleit-wrapper .styleit-section-title {font-size: 12px;}
	.footer .choosers.chooser_AdStyler a:after {content: "\f043";}
	
	
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions
	{
		margin: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth} 0;
		display: none;
	}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul {display: table; width: 100%;}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li {display: table-cell; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li a {box-shadow: inset 0 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);opacity: 0.85; display: block; padding: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth}; color: rgba(255,255,255,.85); text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li:first-child a {border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius} 0 0 {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li:last-child a {border-radius: 0 {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius} {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius} 0;}
	.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li a:hover {opacity: 1; color: #FFF; text-decoration: none;}
	
	.footer .choosers a.uix_colorOptionsToggle {
		background-image: url({xen:property imagePath}/uix/icon_color-swatch.png);
		background-position: 6px 50%;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		padding-left: 28px;
	}
	
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_enableBorderJS} || {xen:property uix_enableULManagerJs}">


<xen:comment> /******* GENERAL ROUNDING *********/ </xen:comment>

.noBorderRadiusTop {
	border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
	border-top-right-radius: 0 !important;
}

.noBorderRadiusBottom {
	border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
	border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
}

.noBorderRadius {
	border-radius: 0 !important;
}

<xen:comment> /******* NAVIGATION AND USERBAR ROUNDING *********/ </xen:comment>


	<xen:comment> /******* .navTabs ROUNDING *********/ </xen:comment>

	.noBorderRadiusTop .navTabs {
		border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
		border-top-right-radius: 0 !important;
	}
	
	.noBorderRadiusBottom .navTabs {
		border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
		border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
	}
	
	.noBorderRadius .navTabs { border-radius: 0 !important; }
	
	
	<xen:comment> /******* .tabLinks ROUNDING *********/ </xen:comment>
	
	.noBorderRadiusBottom .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks {
		border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
		border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
	}
	
	.noBorderRadius .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks { border-radius: 0 !important; }
	

	<xen:comment> /******* .navTab and .navLink ROUNDING *********/ </xen:comment>
	
		<xen:comment> ADD THE RADIUS </xen:comment> 
	
		/* THE FIRST TAB OF THE FIRST UL */
	
		.navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost { 
			border-top-left-radius: {xen:property navTabs.border-top-left-radius}; 
			border-bottom-left-radius: {xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-left-radius};
		}
		
		#userBar .navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost {
			border-top-left-radius: {xen:property uix_userBar_style.border-top-left-radius}; 
			border-bottom-left-radius: {xen:property uix_userBar_style.border-bottom-left-radius};
		}
		
		<xen:if is="!{xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}"> #navigation .navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost { border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important; } </xen:if>
		
			/* NAVLINK */
		
			.navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost .navLink {
				border-radius: inherit;
			}
		
		
		/* THE LAST TAB OF THE "LAST" UL */
		
		.navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost {
			border-top-right-radius: {xen:property navTabs.border-top-right-radius}; 
			border-bottom-right-radius: {xen:property navTabs.border-bottom-right-radius};
		}
		
		#userBar .navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost {
			border-top-right-radius: {xen:property uix_userBar_style.border-top-right-radius}; 
			border-bottom-right-radius: {xen:property uix_userBar_style.border-bottom-right-radius};
		}
		
		<xen:if is="!{xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}"> #navigation .navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost { border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important; } </xen:if>
		
		/* CAN'T USE LAST-OF-TYPE BECAUSE NATURE OF FLOAT: RIGHT */
		
		.navTabs .navRight ~ .navRight .uix_rightMost {
			border-top-right-radius: initial !important;
			border-bottom-right-radius: initial !important;	
		}
		
			/* NAVLINK */
		
			.navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost .navLink {
				border-radius: inherit;
			}
			
		
		<xen:comment> REMOVE THE RADIUS </xen:comment>
		
		/* THE FIRST TAB OF THE FIRST UL */

		.noBorderRadius .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost {
			border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
			border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
		}
		
		.noBorderRadiusBottom .navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost { border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important; }
		
		.noBorderRadiusTop .navTabs .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost { border-top-left-radius: 0 !important; }
		
		
		.activeSticky .navLeft:first-of-type .uix_leftMost {
			border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
			border-top-left-radius: 0 !important;
		}
		
		
		/* THE LAST TAB OF THE "LAST" UL */
		
		.noBorderRadius .navRight .uix_rightMost {
			border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
			border-top-right-radius: 0 !important;
		}
		
		.noBorderRadiusBottom .navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost { border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important; }
		
		.noBorderRadiusTop .navTabs .navRight .uix_rightMost { border-top-left-radius: 0 !important; }
		
		
		.activeSticky .navRight .uix_rightMost {
			border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
			border-top-right-radius: 0 !important;
		}
		
	
		
	
	
	<xen:comment>
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen,
	.navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen .navLink {
		border-bottom-left-radius: 0 !important;
		border-bottom-right-radius: 0 !important;
	}
	</xen:comment>
	
	
</xen:if>

<xen:comment> 
***************************
SET FOOTER COLUMNS VARIABLE 
***************************
</xen:comment>

<xen:if is="!{xen:property uix_useStyleProperties_footer}">
	
	<xen:set var="$uix_showFooterColumns">{$xenOptions.uix_showFooterColumns}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_numFooterColumns">{xen:calc '{$xenOptions.uix_footer_col1} + {$xenOptions.uix_footer_col2} + {$xenOptions.uix_footer_col3} + {$xenOptions.uix_footer_col4}'}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col1_width">{$xenOptions.uix_footer_col1_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col2_width">{$xenOptions.uix_footer_col2_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col3_width">{$xenOptions.uix_footer_col3_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col4_width">{$xenOptions.uix_footer_col4_width}</xen:set>
	
<xen:else />
	
	<xen:set var="{$uix_showFooterColumns}">{xen:property uix_showFooterColumns}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_numFooterColumns">{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_footer_col1} + {xen:property uix_footer_col2} + {xen:property uix_footer_col3} + {xen:property uix_footer_col4}'}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col1_width">{xen:property uix_footer_col1_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col2_width">{xen:property uix_footer_col2_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col3_width">{xen:property uix_footer_col3_width}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$uix_footer_col4_width">{xen:property uix_footer_col4_width}</xen:set>
	
</xen:if>

<xen:comment> 
***************************
EXTENDED FOOTER 
***************************
</xen:comment>

<xen:if is="{$uix_showFooterColumns}">

	.bigFooter .pageContent 
	{
		{xen:property uix_footer_columns_style}
		
		<xen:if is="({xen:property uix_copyright_forceCovered} && {xen:property uix_footerColumns_forceCovered}) || {xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 1">
			margin-bottom: 0;
			margin-top: 0;
		</xen:if>
	}
	
	.bigFooterRow--mainRow {
		margin-left: -{xen:property uix_footer_column_style.padding-left};
		margin-right: -{xen:property uix_footer_column_style.padding-right};	
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .bigFooterRow--mainRow {	
		display: -ms-flexbox;
		display: -webkit-flex;
		display: flex;
		
		-ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
		-webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
		flex-wrap: wrap;
	}
	
	.bigFooterCol 
	{
		vertical-align: top;
		box-sizing: border-box;
		
		{xen:property uix_footer_column_style}
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .bigFooterCol {
		-ms-flex: 1 1 {xen:if {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, '260px'};
		-webkit-flex: 1 1 {xen:if {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, '260px'};
		flex: 1 1 {xen:if {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, {xen:property uix_footerWidth}, '260px'};
	}
	
	<xen:if is="{$uix_footer_col1_width}">
	
		.hasFlexbox .bigFooterCol.bigFooterCol--col1 {
			-ms-flex-preferred-size: {$uix_footer_col1_width};
			-webkit-flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col1_width};
			flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col1_width};
		}
		
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:if is="{$uix_footer_col2_width}">
	
		.hasFlexbox .bigFooterCol.bigFooterCol--col2 {
			-ms-flex-preferred-size: {$uix_footer_col2_width}
			-webkit-flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col2_width};
			flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col2_width};
		}
		
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:if is="{$uix_footer_col3_width}">
	
		.hasFlexbox .bigFooterCol.bigFooterCol--col3 {
			-ms-flex-preferred-size: {$uix_footer_col3_width};
			-webkit-flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col3_width};
			flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col3_width};
		}
		
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:if is="{$uix_footer_col4_width}">
	
		.hasFlexbox .bigFooterCol.bigFooterCol--col4 {
			-ms-flex-preferred-size: {$uix_footer_col4_width};
			-webkit-flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col4_width};
			flex-basis: {$uix_footer_col4_width};
		}
		
	</xen:if>

	.footer .pageContent { margin-bottom: 0; }
</xen:if>

</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_jumpToTopFixed} || {xen:property uix_jumpToBottomFixed}">
#uix_jumpToFixed
{

}

#uix_jumpToFixed a {

	{xen:property uix_jumpToFixed_style.padding}
	}
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_jumpTo_stacked}">
		#uix_jumpToFixed a:first-child {padding-bottom: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}/2'}px;}
		#uix_jumpToFixed a:last-child {padding-top: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}/2'}px;}
	<xen:else />
		#uix_jumpToFixed a:first-child {padding-right: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}/2'}px;}
		#uix_jumpToFixed a:last-child {padding-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}/2'}px;}
	</xen:if>
	
#uix_jumpToFixed:hover {opacity: 1;} 
</xen:if>
.footerLinks a.globalFeed {

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_centerFooterLinks}">

		.Responsive .footer .choosers dd {margin: 0 4px; text-align: center;}
		.Responsive .footerLinks {float: none; padding: 0;}
		.Responsive .footerLinks li {display: inline-block; float: none !important;}
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_centerFooterLinks} != '100%'">
	}
	</xen:if>
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
audentio.grid.addSizeListener(['global' or 'node_X' where X is the nodeID], [class to add], [maxWidth in px], [minWidth in px]);
</xen:comment>

audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'audentio_grid_xs', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xs}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'audentio_grid_sm', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_sm}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'audentio_grid_md', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_md}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'audentio_grid_lg', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_lg}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'audentio_grid_xl', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xl}, 0);

audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'below-xs', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xs}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'below-sm', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_sm}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'below-md', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_md}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'below-lg', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_lg}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'below-xl', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xl}, 0);

audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'above-xs', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xs} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'above-sm', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_sm} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'above-md', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_md} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'above-lg', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_lg} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'above-xl', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xl} + 1'});

audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'node--xs', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_sm}, 0);
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'node--sm', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_md}, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_sm} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'node--md', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_lg}, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_md} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'node--lg', {xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xl}, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_lg} + 1'});
audentio.grid.addSizeListener('global', 'node--xl', 99999, {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_xl} + 1'});

<xen:comment> /*** LOGIN BAR ***/ </xen:comment>

#loginBar .xenForm {
	max-width: {xen:property uix_pageWidth};
}

#loginBar .pageContent {
	padding: 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidth};
}

<xen:comment> /*** CUSTOM LOGIN FORM uix_loginForm ***/ </xen:comment>

.Responsive .xenForm.xenForm--uixLoginForm .ctrlUnit {
	padding-left: 0;
	padding-right: 0;
}

.xenForm.xenForm--uixLoginForm .ctrlUnit > dd {
	padding-left: 0;
	padding-right: 0;
}

.xenForm.xenForm--uixLoginForm .ctrlUnit > dt label {
	margin-left: 0;
}

<xen:comment> /*** LOGIN FORM OVERLAY helper_login_form ***/ </xen:comment>

.formOverlay#pageLogin {
	max-width: 400px;
	margin: 0 auto;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin h2.textHeading {
	display: none;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .textCtrl.disabled {
	display: none;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit {
	overflow: visible;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit dt {
	margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit dt {
	float: none;
	width: auto;
	text-align: left;
	height: auto;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit dt dfn {
	display: inline;
	margin: 0;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit > dd {
	padding-top: 0;
	float: none;
	width: auto;
	padding-left: {xen:property ctrlUnitEdgeSpacer};
}

@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
	.Responsive .formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit > dd {
		padding-left: 0;
	}
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit dd .bbCodeEditorContainer textarea {
	margin-left: 0;
	min-height: 200px;
}

.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit > dd > ul,
.formOverlay#pageLogin .ctrlUnit > dd > input,
.formOverlay#pageLogin > dd > select,
.formOverlay#pageLogin > dd > textarea {
	margin-top: 0;
}

#XenForo a.twitterLogin span,
#XenForo a.fbLogin span,
#XenForo .googleLogin span {
	width: auto;
	height: {xen:property uix_formElementHeight};
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
	border: none;
	line-height: {xen:property uix_formElementHeight};
	
	background: none;
	text-shadow: none;
	color: #FFF;
	text-align: center;
	
	border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

<xen:comment> /*** SOCIAL LOGIN BUTTONS ***/ </xen:comment>

#XenForo a.twitterLogin span:before,
#XenForo a.fbLogin span:before,
#XenForo .googleLogin span:before {
	font-family: FontAwesome;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: normal;
	line-height: 1;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	margin-right: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
}

#XenForo a.twitterLogin span:before {content: "\f099";}
#XenForo a.fbLogin span:before {content: "\f09a";}
#XenForo .googleLogin span:before {content: "\f0d5";}

#XenForo a.twitterLogin span:hover,
#XenForo a.fbLogin span:hover,
#XenForo .googleLogin span:hover {background: rgba(0,0,0,.1);}

#XenForo a.twitterLogin,
#XenForo a.fbLogin,
#XenForo .googleLogin
{
	display: block;
	background: none;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	border: none;
	text-shadow: none;
	color: #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	height: auto;
	font-size: {xen:property uix_globalLargeFontSize};
	border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};
}

#XenForo a.twitterLogin, #loginBar a.twitterLogin {background: #77CDF0;}
#XenForo a.fbLogin, #loginBar a.fbLogin {background: #537CBE;}
#XenForo .googleLogin, #loginBar .googleLogin {background: #E9654C;}

<xen:comment>

ALL RULES REQUIRED FOR MODERN LAYOUT SETTINGS ARE PREFIXED WITH CLASS .hasFlexbox

DEFAULT STATE:				MESSAGE IS FLEX CONTAINER
					MESSAGE INFO IS FLEX CONTAINER
					MESSAGE CONTENT FLEX-GROW IS SET TO TRUE
					MESSAGE USER INFO FLEX-SHRINK SET TO FALSE

ADDED BY CLASSIC POSTBIT:		MESSAGE USER INFO BECOMES A FLEX CONTAINER
					MESSAGE FLEX DIRECTION IS SET TO COLUMN
					
ADDED BY RESPONSIVE POSTBIT:		MESSAGE USER INFO BECOMES A FLEX CONTAINER
					MESSAGE FLEX DIRECTION IS SET TO COLUMN

</xen:comment>


{xen:helper clearfix, '.message .privateControls'}
{xen:helper clearfix, '.message .publicControls'}

.message .messageInfo {
	margin-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property messageUserInfo.width} + {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} + 10'}px;
	{xen:if {xen:property messageInfo.margin-left}, 'margin-left: {xen:property messageInfo.margin-left};'}
}

#QuickReply {
	margin-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property messageUserInfo.width} + {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} + 10'}px;
}

@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth}) {
	#QuickReply .submitUnit {
		display: flex;
		margin: 5px -5px 0;
		flex-wrap: wrap;
	}
	#QuickReply .submitUnit > *,
	#QuickReply .insertQuotes {
	    margin: 5px !important;
	    flex: 1 0 150px;
	}
	
	#QuickReply #ctrl_uploader {width: 100%;}
	#QuickReply #AttachmentUploader {position: relative;}
	#QuickReply .swfupload {top: 0 !important;}
	
	#QuickReply .submitUnit .button.primary {
		order: -1;
	}
}

.messageUserBlock div.uix_avatarHolderInner {
	position: relative;
	text-align: center;
	margin: 0 auto;
}

.message.placeholder .messageContent { min-height: 0; }

<xen:comment> MODERN LAYOUTS APPLIED </xen:comment>
		

	.hasFlexbox .messageList .uix_message {
		display: -ms-flexbox; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
	        display: -webkit-flex;
	        display: flex;
	        
	        <xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stretchPostbit}">
	        
	        -ms-flex-align: stretch; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-align-items: stretch;
		align-items: stretch;
		
		<xen:else />
		
		-ms-flex-align: start; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-align-items: flex-start;
		align-items: flex-start;
		
		</xen:if>
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .messageList .placeholder .placeholderContent {
		display: -ms-flexbox; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
	        display: -webkit-flex;
	        display: flex;
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .messageList .placeholder a.avatar {
		-ms-flex: 0 0 auto; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
		flex: 0 0 auto;	
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .message .messageUserInfo {
		-ms-flex: 0 0 auto; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
		flex: 0 0 auto;
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .message .messageInfo {
		display: -ms-flexbox; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
	        display: -webkit-flex;
	        display: flex;
	        -ms-flex-direction: column; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
	        -webkit-flex-direction: column;
	        flex-direction: column;
		
		-ms-flex: 1 1 100%; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-flex: 1 1 100%;
		flex: 1 1 100%;
		
		overflow: hidden; /* wrap images - FF */
		
		margin-left: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth};
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .message .messageContent {
		-ms-flex: 1 1 auto; /* 2012 syntax for IE10 */
		-webkit-flex: 1 1 auto;
		flex: 1 1 auto;
	}

<xen:comment> MESSAGE DETAILS </xen:comment>
	
	.message .messageDetails {
		{xen:property uix_messageDetails_style}
	}
	
	.message .messageDetails:after {
		content: '.';
		display: block;
		height: 0;
		clear: right;
		visibility: hidden;
	}

	.message .editDate {
		font-size: inherit;
		text-align: inherit;
		margin-top: 0;
	}
	.message .messageDetails .item {
		white-space: nowrap;
		display: inline-block;
		margin-left: 5px;
	}
	.message .messageDetails .postNumber {
		{xen:property uix_postNumber_style}
	}

.attachedFiles .attachmentList,
.messageList .newMessagesNotice {
	background-image: none;
}

.userBanner {
	background-image: none; 
	padding-top: 4px; 
	padding-bottom: 4px;
	box-shadow: none;
}

.messageUserBlock .userBanner {
	margin-top: 5px;
}


<xen:comment> POSTBIT AVATAR </xen:comment>
	
	@media (min-width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_responsiveMessageBreakpoint} + 1'}px) {
	
		.messageUserBlock div.uix_avatarHolderInner
		{
			position: relative;
		
			margin: 0 auto;
			
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_postbit_avatarSize} == 'l'">
				max-width: {xen:property messageUserInfo.width};
			<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_postbit_avatarSize} == 's'" />
				max-width: 48px;
			<xen:else />
				max-width: 96px;
			</xen:if>	
		}
		.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar img 
		{
			max-width: 100%;
			width: auto;
			height: auto;
		}
	}

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_postbit_avatarSize} == 'l'">
	
	.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar img {
		border-radius: {xen:property avatar.border-radius};
	}
	
		<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
		@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_responsiveMessageBreakpoint}) {
			.Responsive .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar {
				height: 48px;
				width: 48px;
				line-height: 48px;
			}
			
			.Responsive .messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar img {
				max-height: 48px;
				max-width: 48px;
				height: auto;
				width: auto;
				vertical-align: middle;
			}
		}
		</xen:if>
	
	</xen:if>
	
	
<xen:comment> MESSAGE CONTROLS </xen:comment>

	<xen:if is="!{xen:property uix_plainMessageControls}">
	.message .publicControls .MultiQuoteControl.active {
		background-color: {xen:property uix_tertiaryColor};
		color: #FFF;
		border-color: transparent;
	}
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_messageControlIcons}">
	
	.messageMeta .control:before,
	.messageMeta .uix_icon {
		display: inline-block;
		font-family: FontAwesome;
		font-style: normal;
		font-weight: normal;
		line-height: 1;
		-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
		-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
		
		margin-right: 5px;
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.reply:before {
		content: "\f112";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.edit:before {
		content: "\f040";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.delete:before {
		content: "\f014";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.deleteSpam:before {
		content: "\f05e";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.ip:before {
		content: "\f124";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.like:before {
		content: "\f164";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.unlike:before {
		content: "\f165";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.MultiQuoteControl:before {
		content: "\f10d";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.history:before {
		content: "\f1da";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.warn:before {
		content: "\f071";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.report:before {
		content: "\f06a";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .control.postComment:before {
		content: "\f075";
	}
	
	.messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu .uix_icon:before {
		content: "\f0ad";
	}
		
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_plainMessageControls}">
	
	.message .messageMeta .control,
	.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu {
		background: none !important;
		border: none !important;
		box-shadow: none !important;	
	}
	
	</xen:if>
	


	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu} != 0">

	.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu {
		{xen:property messageMetaControl}
	}
	
	.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu a {
		color: inherit;
		display: block;
	}
	
	.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu:hover {
		{xen:property popupControlClosedHover}	
	}
	
	.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu.PopupOpen {
		{xen:property popupControl}
	}
	
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_plainMessageControls}">
		
		.message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu.PopupOpen {color: inherit !important;}
		
		</xen:if>
	
	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu} != '100%'">

	.Responsive .message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu
	{
		display: none;
	}
	
	@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu})
	{
		.Responsive .thread_view .message .privateControls,
		.Responsive .th_liked_posts_list .message .privateControls
		{
			display: none;	
		}
		

		.Responsive .message.deleted .messageMeta {clear: both; line-height: 30px; float: left;}
		.Responsive .message.deleted .privateControls {display: block;}
		.Responsive .message.deleted .privateControls .item.InlineModCheck {float: none; display: inline-block;}
		
		.Responsive .message .messageMeta .uix_postbit_privateControlsMenu
		{
			display: inline-block;
		}	
	}

	</xen:if>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_centerPostbitLinks}">
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_centerPostbitLinks} == '100%'">
	
		.message .privateControls, .message .publicControls {float: none; text-align: center;}
	
	<xen:else />
	
		@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_centerPostbitLinks}) {
			.message .privateControls, .message .publicControls {float: none; text-align: center;}
		}
		
	</xen:if>
	</xen:if>


<xen:comment> ONLINE MARKER </xen:comment>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_messageOnlineMarker_circle}">
	
	.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker {
		{xen:property uix_messageOnlineMarker_circle_style}
	}
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_messageOnlineMarker_circlePulse}">
		
		.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker {
			z-index: 10;
			
			-moz-transition: ease-out 0.1s;
			-o-transition: ease-out 0.1s;
			-webkit-transition: ease-out 0.1s;
			transition: ease-out 0.1s;
		}
		
		.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker_pulse {
			border: 10px solid {xen:property uix_messageOnlineMarker_circle_style.background-color};
			background: transparent;
			-webkit-border-radius: 40px;
			-moz-border-radius: 40px;
			border-radius: 40px;
			height: 40px;
			width: 40px;
			-webkit-animation: pulse 3s ease-out infinite;
			-moz-animation: pulse 3s ease-out infinite;
			animation: pulse 3s ease-out infinite;
			position: absolute;
			top: -25px;
			left: -25px;
			z-index: 1;
			opacity: 0;
		}
		
		@-moz-keyframes pulse {
			0% {
			-moz-transform: scale(0);
			opacity: 0.0;
			}
			25% {
			-moz-transform: scale(0);
			opacity: 0.1;
			}
			50% {
			-moz-transform: scale(0.1);
			opacity: 0.3;
			}
			75% {
			-moz-transform: scale(0.5);
			opacity: 0.5;
			}
			100% {
			-moz-transform: scale(1);
			opacity: 0.0;
			}
		}
		
		@-webkit-keyframes "pulse" {
			0% {
			-webkit-transform: scale(0);
			opacity: 0.0;
			}
			25% {
			-webkit-transform: scale(0);
			opacity: 0.1;
			}
			50% {
			-webkit-transform: scale(0.1);
			opacity: 0.3;
			}
			75% {
			-webkit-transform: scale(0.5);
			opacity: 0.5;
			}
			100% {
			-webkit-transform: scale(1);
			opacity: 0.0;
			}
		}
		
		</xen:if>

	</xen:if>


<xen:comment> CLASSIC POSTBIT </xen:comment>

<xen:comment> visibility hidden prevents flashing. visibility is set to visible via js once node grid has run. </xen:comment>

.hasJs #forums,
.hasJs .category_view .nodeList,
.hasJs .watch_forums .nodeList { visibility: hidden; }

<xen:comment> override visibility: hidden when node grid is disabled for the view. </xen:comment>

.hasJs.uix_nodeGridDisabled #forums,
.hasJs.uix_nodeGridDisabled .category_view .nodeList,
.hasJs.uix_nodeGridDisabled .watch_forums .nodeList { visibility: visible; }

.node.level_1.audentio_grid { width: 100%; }

.nodeList .node {
	box-sizing: border-box;
	clear: none;
}

.nodeList .node.audentio_grid { float: left; }

.nodeList .node.audentio_grid_left { clear: left; }

.nodeList .categoryForumNodeInfo, 
.nodeList .forumNodeInfo, 
.nodeList .pageNodeInfo, 
.nodeList .linkNodeInfo { 
	{xen:property uix_nodeGrid_nodeStyle}
}

.node.level_2 { width: 100%; }

.node.level_2 .nodeInfo { 
	width: 100%;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.node.audentio_grid .subForumList,
.node.audentio_grid .subForumsPopup { display: block; }
.subForumsPopup .PopupControl {line-height: 1;}


.node.audentio_grid_lg .nodeLastPost {
	position: static;
	width: auto;
	height: auto;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidth} {xen:property uix_gutterWidth} {xen:property uix_gutterWidth};
}

.node.audentio_grid_lg .nodeControls { right: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}; }

.node.audentio_grid_lg .nodeText { margin-right: 32px; }

.node.audentio_grid_lg .nodeControls {
	top: 0; 
	margin-top: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
}

.node.audentio_grid_md .nodeLastPost .avatar { display: none; }

.node.audentio_grid.audentio_grid_sm .subForumList { display: none; }

.node.audentio_grid.audentio_grid_xs .subForumsPopup { display: none; }



<xen:comment>

 ***   GUTTER BETWEEN LEVEL 1'S
 ***/
</xen:comment>

.forum_list #forums {
	margin-left: -{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
	margin-right: -{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
}

#forums .node.level_1 {
	padding-left: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
	padding-right: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
}



<xen:comment>
/***
 ***   GUTTER BETWEEN LEVEL 2'S
 ***/
</xen:comment>

.forum_list .nodeList .nodeList,
.category_view .nodeList,
.forum_view .nodeList,
.watch_forums .nodeList {         
        margin-left: -{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} / 2'}px;
        margin-right: -{xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} / 2'}px;
}

.forum_list .nodeList .nodeList { margin-top: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} / 2'}px; }

.node.level_2 {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        padding: 0 {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} / 2'}px;
        margin: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} / 2'}px 0; 
}

<xen:comment>
/***
 ***   FLEX LAYOUT TO MATCH LEVEL 2 HEIGHTS
 ***/
</xen:comment>

.hasFlexbox .node.level_2 {
        display: -ms-flexbox;
        display: -webkit-flex; 
        display: flex;
}

.hasFlexbox .forum_view .nodeList,
.hasFlexbox .watch_forums .nodeList,
.hasFlexbox .category_view .nodeList,
.hasFlexbox .forum_list .nodeList .nodeList {
        display: -ms-flexbox;
        display: -webkit-flex; 
        display: flex;
        
	-webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
	-ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
}

<xen:comment> changed from flex: 0 1 100% in 1.4.6.1</xen:comment>
.hasFlexbox .node.level_2 .nodeInfo {
	-ms-flex: 0 1 auto;
	-webkit-flex: 0 1 auto;
	flex: 0 1 auto;

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_nodeStyle} == 3"><script>
	if (typeof(audentio) !== "undefined" && typeof(audentio.grid) !== "undefined") {
		audentio.grid.addSubNode('{$node.node_id}');
	} else {
		console.warn("Unable to initialize node separator.  Make sure that the UIX functions file is up to date and being loaded.");
	}		
</script></xen:if>

/* Node Styling */
{xen:raw $cssOutput}
</style>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} > 0 || {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} > 0">

	/*** UIX PANELS -- BREAKPOINTS ***/
	
	.navTab--panelTrigger { display: none !important; }
		
	.Responsive #userBar.uix_offCanvasVisitorTabs.uix_noUserBarContent { display: none; }
	
	
	/*** UIX PANELS -- PUBLIC TABS BREAKPOINT IF NAVIGATION TYPE SIDE PANEL ***/		
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 1 || {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 1">
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 1">
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_leftPanelBreakpoint} != '100%'">
				<xen:set var="$navPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_leftPanelBreakpoint}" />		
			</xen:if>	
		<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 1" />
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_rightPanelBreakpoint} != '100%'">
				<xen:set var="$navPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_rightPanelBreakpoint}" />		
			</xen:if>		
		</xen:if>
		
		{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '@media screen and (max-width: {$navPanelBreakpoint}) {'}
	
			{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} #navigation .publicTabs .navTab:not(.navTab--navPanelTrigger):not(.selected) { display: none !important; }
		
			{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} #navigation .publicTabs .selected .navLink,
			{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} #navigation .publicTabs .selected .SplitCtrl { display: none !important; }
		
			{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} .navTab--navPanelTrigger {display: list-item !important;}
		
		{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '}'}
	</xen:if>
	
	
	/*** UIX PANELS -- VISITOR TABS BREAKPOINT IF VISITOR TYPE SIDE PANEL ***/	
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 2 || {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 2">
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 2">
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_leftPanelBreakpoint} != '100%'">
				<xen:set var="$visitorPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_leftPanelBreakpoint}" />		
			</xen:if>	
		<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 2" />
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_rightPanelBreakpoint} != '100%'">
				<xen:set var="$visitorPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_rightPanelBreakpoint}" />		
			</xen:if>
		</xen:if>
	
		{xen:if $visitorPanelBreakpoint, '@media screen and (max-width: {$visitorPanelBreakpoint}) {'}
			
			{xen:if $visitorPanelBreakpoint , '.Responsive'} .visitorTabs .navTab.account:not(.navTab--panelTrigger),
			{xen:if $visitorPanelBreakpoint , '.Responsive'} .visitorTabs .navTab.inbox,
			{xen:if $visitorPanelBreakpoint , '.Responsive'} .visitorTabs .navTab.alerts { 
				display: none !important; 
			}
			
			{xen:if $navPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} .navTab--visitorPanelTrigger {display: list-item !important;}
		
		{xen:if $visitorPanelBreakpoint, '}'}
	</xen:if>
	
	/*** UIX PANELS -- SIDEBAR BREAKPOINT IF SIDEBAR SIDE PANEL ***/	
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 4 || {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 4">
		
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeft} == 4">
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeftStatic}">
				<xen:set var="$sidebarPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeftStaticBreakpoint}" />
			</xen:if>	
		<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRight} == 4" />
			<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRightStatic}">
				<xen:set var="$sidebarPanelBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRightStaticBreakpoint}" />
			</xen:if>
		</xen:if>
	
		{xen:if $sidebarPanelBreakpoint, '@media screen and (max-width: {$sidebarPanelBreakpoint}) {'}	
			{xen:if $sidebarPanelBreakpoint, '.Responsive'} .navTab--sidebarPanelTrigger {display: list-item !important;}
		{xen:if $sidebarPanelBreakpoint, '}'}
	</xen:if>
	
	.uix_panels.is-triggered .sticky_wrapper,
	.uix_panels.is-animating .sticky_wrapper { 
		position: static !important;
		margin-left: 0 !important;
		margin-right: 0 !important;
	}
	
	.uix_panels.is-triggered .uix_mainSidebar.sticky .inner_wrapper, 
	.uix_panels.is-animating .uix_mainSidebar.sticky .inner_wrapper {
		position: static !important;	
	}
	
	.hasJs #userBar { display: none; }

	.uix_panels {
		position: relative;
		overflow: hidden;
		<xen:comment>
			/* these rules caused that weird Firefox Mobile issue */
			overflow-x: hidden;
			overflow-y: auto;
		</xen:comment>
		width: 100%;
		min-height: 100vh;
	}
	  
	.mainPanelWrapper {
		position: relative;
		min-height: 100vh;
		{xen:if '!{$pageIsRtl}', 'left', 'right'}: 0px;
	}
	
	.sidePanelWrapper {
		width: 250px; <xen:comment>/* just a default width */</xen:comment>
		overflow-y: auto;
	
		position: absolute;
		top: 0px;
		bottom: 0px;
		-webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
		
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_style}
	}
	
	<xen:comment> /*** TBRO - NOT SURE WHY THIS RULE EXISTS ***/ </xen:comment>
	.uix_panels.is-leftShowing .mainPanelWrapper, 
	.uix_panels.is-leftShowing .sidePanelWrapper--left {
		overflow-x: hidden;
	}
	
	
	/*** PANEL OVERLAY MASKS ***/
	
	@-webkit-keyframes panelMaskIn {
		from {opacity: 0;}
		to {opacity: {xen:property overlayMaskOpacity};}
	}
	
	@keyframes panelMaskIn {
		from {opacity: 0;}
		to {opacity: {xen:property overlayMaskOpacity};}
	}
	
	@-webkit-keyframes panelMaskOut {
		from {opacity: {xen:property overlayMaskOpacity};}
		to {opacity: 0;}
	}
	
	@keyframes panelMaskOut {
		from {opacity: {xen:property overlayMaskOpacity};}
		to {opacity: 0;}
	}
	    
	.uix_panelMask {
		visibility: hidden;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		
		z-index: 1001;
	
		position: absolute;
		top: 0px;
		left: 0px;
		
		background: {xen:property overlayMaskColor};
		
		opacity: 0;
		-webkit-animation: panelMaskOut {xen:calc '{xen:property overlaySpeed} * {xen:property animationSpeedMultiplier}'}ms linear;
		animation: panelMaskOut {xen:calc '{xen:property overlaySpeed} * {xen:property animationSpeedMultiplier}'}ms linear;
	}
	
	.uix_panels.is-triggered .mainPanelWrapper .uix_panelMask,
	.uix_panels.is-leftTriggered .sidePanelWrapper:not(.sidePanelWrapper--left) .uix_panelMask,
	.uix_panels.is-rightTriggered .sidePanelWrapper:not(.sidePanelWrapper--right) .uix_panelMask {
		visibility: visible;
	
		opacity: {xen:property overlayMaskOpacity};
		-webkit-animation-name: panelMaskIn;
		animation-name: panelMaskIn;
	}
	
	<xen:comment>/*** SET BREAKPOINTS FOR STATIC PANELS ***/</xen:comment>
		
	<xen:if is="!{$pageIsRtl}">
		<xen:set var="$actualLeftStaticBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeftStaticBreakpoint}" />
		<xen:set var="$actualRightStaticBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRightStaticBreakpoint}" />
	<xen:else />
		<xen:set var="$actualLeftStaticBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarRightStaticBreakpoint}" />
		<xen:set var="$actualRightStaticBreakpoint" value="{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebarLeftStaticBreakpoint}" />
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:comment>/*** FIXES SOME OVERLAP ISSUES ***/</xen:comment>
	
	.uix_panels:not(.is-animating):not(.is-leftShowing) .sidePanelWrapper--left,
	.uix_panels:not(.is-animating):not(.is-leftShowing) .sidePanelWrapper--left *,
	.uix_panels:not(.is-animating):not(.is-rightShowing) .sidePanelWrapper--right,
	.uix_panels:not(.is-animating):not(.is-rightShowing) .sidePanelWrapper--right * {
		visibility: hidden !important;
	}
	
	
	/*** UIX PANELS -- ANIMATIONS ***/
	
	<xen:set var="$animationDuration">{xen:property uix_panelAnimationDuration}</xen:set>
	<xen:set var="$animationFunction">cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1)</xen:set>
	
	.mainPanelWrapper,
	.sidePanelWrapper {
		-moz-transition: -moz-transform {$animationFunction} {$animationDuration}; /* Older Firefox */
		-o-transition: -o-transform {$animationFunction} {$animationDuration};
		-o-transition: transform {$animationFunction} {$animationDuration}; 
		
		-webkit-transition: -webkit-transform {$animationFunction} {$animationDuration}; /* Older Android Browser  */

	/*** PANELS ***/
	
	.sidePanel {
		height: 100%;
		overflow-x: hidden;
		overflow-y: auto;
	}
	
	.sidePanel a {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelLink}
	}
	
	.sidePanel a:hover {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelLinkHover}
	}
	
	.sidePanel__blockLinksList a {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelBlockLink}		
	}
	
	.sidePanel__blockLinksList .visibilityForm {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelBlockLink}
	}
	
	.sidePanel .sidePanel__blockLinksList .itemCount {
		transform: none;
		position: static;
		margin-top: -2px; <xen:comment>Quick easy positioning --mc</xen:comment>
	}
	.sidePanel .sidePanel__blockLinksList .itemCount.Zero {display: none;}
	
	.sidePanel .pairs dt,
	.sidePanel .pairsInline dt,
	.sidePanel .pairsRows dt,
	.sidePanel .pairsColumns dt,
	.sidePanel .pairsJustified dt {color: inherit;}
	
	/*** SIDE PANEL -- NAVTABS ***/
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab { position: relative; }
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navLink {
		display: block;
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink}
		
		padding-right: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.height};
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
		white-space: nowrap;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navLink:hover {
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLinkHover}
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink {
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navTabSelected}
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .SplitCtrl {
		display: block;
		height: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.height};
		width: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.height};
		
		position: absolute;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		
		line-height: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.height};
		text-align: center;
		color: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.color};	
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .SplitCtrl:hover {
		text-decoration: none;
		color: {xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navLink.color};
	}
	
	<xen:comment>
		/* tbro -- unnecessary after uix-icon fix */
		.sidePanel__navTabs .SplitCtrl .uix_icon { line-height: inherit; }
	</xen:comment>
		
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab .tabLinks {
		opacity: 0;
		max-height: 0;
	
		-moz-transition: opacity .3s linear, max-height .3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		-o-transition: opacity .3s linear, max-height .3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		-webkit-transition: opacity .3s linear, max-height .3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		transition: opacity .3s linear, max-height .3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		
		overflow: hidden;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab.is-active .tabLinks {
		opacity: 1;
		max-height: 600px;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab .blockLinksList { 
		padding: 10px 0;
		background: transparent;
		border-bottom: none;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab .blockLinksList a {
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navTabLink}
		overflow: hidden;
		text-overflow: ellipsis;
		white-space: nowrap;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab .blockLinksList a:hover {
		{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_navTabLinkHover}
	}

	.sidePanel__navTabs .navTab .blockLinksList a:focus { 
		color: inherit; 
		background-color: inherit; 
	}
	
	
	/*** SIDE PANELS -- TABS AND TAB PANELS ***/
	
	.sidePanel__tabPanel {
		height: 0;
		
		-moz-transition: -moz-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		-o-transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		-o-transition: -o-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		-webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		transition: -webkit-transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.22, 0.61, 0.36, 1);
		
		float: left;
		width: 100%;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__tabPanel.is-left {
		transform: translate3d(-{xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_style.width}, 0, 0);
	}
	
	.sidePanel__tabPanel.is-right {
		transform: translate3d({xen:property uix_offCanvasSidebar_style.width}, 0, 0);
	}
	
	.sidePanel__tabPanel.is-active {
		transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
		display: block;
	}
	
	.sidePanel__tabPanel.is-hidden {
		visibility: hidden;
	}
	
	.hasFlexbox .sidePanel__tabs {
		display: -ms-flexbox;
		display: -webkit-flex;
		display: flex;
	
		-webkit-justify-content: space-between;
		-ms-flex-pack: justify;
	        justify-content: space-between;

	{xen:helper clearfix, '.not-flexbox .sidePanel__tabs'}
	
	.hasFlexbox .sidePanel__tabs li {
		max-width: 50%;
		-webkit-flex: 1 1 auto;
		-ms-flex: 1 1 auto;
		flex: 1 1 auto;
	}
	
	.no-flexbox .sidePanel__tabs li {
		float: left;
	}

	a.sidePanel__tab {
		
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelTab}
	}
	
	a.sidePanel__tab:hover { color: {xen:property uix_sidePanelTab.color};  }
	
	a.sidePanel__tab.is-active {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelTabActive};
	}

	}
	
	.sidePanel__tabs .itemCount.Zero { display: none; }
	
	.sidePanel__textHeading {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelTextHeading}
	}
	

	/*** SIDE PANELS -- ACCOUNT TAB PANEL ***/
	
	.sidePanel--visitor .visitorPanel .avatar { 
		float: left; 
		margin-right: 12px;
	}
	
	.sidePanel--visitor .visitorPanel .avatar img { 
		width: 32px; 
		height: 32px; 
	}
	
	.sidePanel--visitor .visitorPanel .secondaryContent { 
		padding: 0;

	.sidePanel--visitor .visitorPanel h2 .muted { display: none; }
	
	.sidePanel--visitor .visitorPanel .stats { font-size: {xen:property uix_globalSmallFontSize}; }
	
	.sidePanel .textCtrl {
		{xen:property uix_sidePanelTextCtrl}
	}
	
	.sidePanel .statusPoster .statusEditorCounter { display: none; }
	
	.sidePanel .statusPoster .button { width: 100%; }
	.sidePanel .statusPoster .button:active {background-color: {xen:property buttonDisabled.background-color};}
	
	.sidePanel .statusPoster .StatusEditor { width: 100%; }
	
	
	/*** SIDE PANELS -- ALERTS AND CONVOS TAB PANELS ***/

	/*** SIDE PANELS -- SIDEBAR PANEL ***/

		width: 100%;

	}

		background: none;
		box-shadow: none;
		border: none;
		padding: 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidth};

		}

		{xen:property uix_sidePanelTextHeading.font}

<xen:comment> <!-- WIDTH TOGGLE --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is="{xen:property uix_widthToggle}"> <xen:comment> <!-- TRUE IS FULL WIDTH, FALSE IS SET WIDTH --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is="{$visitor.user_id}"> <xen:set var="$uix_widthToggleState" value="{xen:if $visitor.uix_width, '1', '0'}" /> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$uix_widthToggleState" value="{xen:if $xenOptions.uix_defaultWidth, '1', '0'}" /> </xen:if> </xen:if>
<xen:comment> <!-- AD STYLER --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is="{xen:property uix_adStylerOn} && ( {$uix_canUseStylerPanel} || {$uix_canUseStylerPresets} || {$uix_canUseStylerSwatches} )"> <xen:set var="$uix_adStyler_enabled" value="1" /> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$uix_adStyler_enabled" value="0" /> </xen:if>
<xen:comment> <!-- ACTUAL SEARCH POSITION --> </xen:comment> <xen:set var="$uix_searchPosition"><xen:if is="( {xen:property uix_searchPosition} == 1 && ( {xen:property uix_navStyle} == 2 || ({xen:property uix_navStyle} == 3 && {xen:property uix_pageStyle} != 1) ) || ({xen:property uix_searchPosition} == 0 && {xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}) )">2<xen:else />{xen:property uix_searchPosition}</xen:if></xen:set>
<xen:comment> <!-- WELCOME BLOCK LOGIC --> </xen:comment> <xen:set var="$uix_welcomeBlockOptionEnabled">{xen:if {xen:property uix_useStyleProperties_welcomeBlock}, '{xen:property uix_showWelcomeBlock}', '{$xenOptions.uix_enableWelcomeBlock}'}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$uix_welcomeBlock_showAllTemplates">{xen:if {xen:property uix_useStyleProperties_welcomeBlock}, '{xen:property uix_welcomeBlock_showAllTemplates}', '{$xenOptions.uix_welcomeBlock_showAllTemplates}'}</xen:set> <xen:if is=" ( {$uix_welcomeBlockOptionEnabled} && {$uix_canViewWelcomeBlock} && ({$uix_showWelcomeBlock} || {$uix_welcomeBlock_showAllTemplates}) && !{$uix_hideWelcomeBlock} ) "> <xen:set var="$hasWelcomeBlock" value="1" /> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$hasWelcomeBlock" value="0" /> </xen:if>
<xen:comment> <!-- TOP BREAD CRUMB --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is=" !{$uix_hideTopBreadcrumb} && !(({$selectedTabId} == {$homeTabId}) && ({$homeTabId} != 'forums' && {$homeTabId}) && {xen:property uix_removeBreadCrumbOnIndex}) "> <xen:set var="$hasBreadBoxTop" value="1" /> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$hasBreadBoxTop" value="0" /> </xen:if>
<xen:comment> <!-- BOTTOM BREAD CRUMB --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is=" !{xen:property uix_hideBottomBreadcrumb} && !{$uix_hideBottomBreadcrumb} && !(({$selectedTabId} == {$homeTabId}) && ({$homeTabId} != 'forums') && {xen:property uix_removeBreadCrumbOnIndex}) "> <xen:set var="$hasBreadBoxBottom" value="1" /> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$hasBreadBoxBottom" value="0" /> </xen:if>
<xen:comment> <!-- SIDEBAR POSITION --> </xen:comment> <xen:if is=" ({xen:property uix_sidebarLocation} || {$uix_sidebarToLeft}) && !{$uix_sidebarToRight} "> <xen:set var="$uix_sidebarLocation">1</xen:set> <xen:else /> <xen:set var="$uix_sidebarLocation">0</xen:set> </xen:if>

<script>
</script>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 2">

	/*** UIX -- RESPONSIVE PAGE WRAPPER ***/
	
	@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) {
		.Responsive #uix_wrapper {
			padding-top: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveWide.padding-right};
			padding-bottom: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveWide.padding-right};
		}	
	}
	
	@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth}) {
		.Responsive #uix_wrapper {
			padding-top: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveMedium.padding-right};
			padding-bottom: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveMedium.padding-right};
		}	
	}
	
	@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
		.Responsive #uix_wrapper {
			padding-top: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveNarrow.padding-right};
			padding-bottom: {xen:property pageWidthResponsiveNarrow.padding-right};
		}	
	}
	
	@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_pageStyle2_breakpoint}) {
	
		.Responsive #uix_wrapper {
			{xen:property uix_pageStyle2_responsive}
		}
		
		.Responsive .pageWidth--outerMost {
			max-width: none !important;
			padding-left: 0;
			padding-right: 0;
		}
	}
	
</xen:if>	

/*** UIX -- WIDE RESPONSIVE RULES ***/

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) {

	.Responsive .pageWidth { max-width: none !important; }

	.Responsive .blockLinksList a, 
	.Responsive .blockLinksList label { padding: 10px; }
}


/*** UIX -- MEDIUM RESPONSIVE RULES ***/

@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth}) {

	.Responsive .profilePage .mast > * {
		max-width: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .navTabs {
		font-size: {xen:property uix_responsiveNavigationFontSize};
	}
	
	.Responsive #userBar .navTabs {
		font-size: {xen:property uix_responsiveUserBarFontSize};
	}
	
	.Responsive #navigation .navTabs,
	.Responsive #userBar .navTabs {
		padding-left: 0;
		padding-right: 0;
	}
	
	.Responsive .moderatorTabs a i + .itemLabel {display: none;}
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_adStylerOn}">
		.uix_adStylerColorOptions ul li a {text-indent: -999999px;}
	</xen:if>
	
}
	
	
/*** UIX -- NARROW RESPONSIVE RULES ***/

@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
	
	.Responsive .resourceInfo .downloadButton { display: block; }
	
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup { text-align: center; }
	
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .PageNav,
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup {
		clear: both;
		display: inline-block;
	}
	
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup .Popup { margin-left: 0; }
	
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup .Popup, 
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup .element,
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup a {
		margin: 0 5px; 
		display: inline-block; 
		float: none;
	}
	
	.Responsive .topCtrl.topCtrl--inContent,
	.Responsive .breadBoxTop.withTopCtrl .topCtrl,
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup,
	.Responsive .nodeListNewDiscussionButton{
		display: block;
		float: none;
		width: 100%;
		text-align: center;
		margin-left: 0;
		
	}
	
	.Responsive .breadBoxTop.withTopCtrl .topCtrl { margin-top: {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall}; }
	
	.Responsive .topCtrl.topCtrl--inContent { margin-bottom: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth}; }
	
	.Responsive .topCtrl a.callToAction,
	.Responsive .pageNavLinkGroup .linkGroup a.callToAction,
	.Responsive .nodeListNewDiscussionButton a.callToAction { display: block; }
	
	.Responsive .navTabs .navTab.account .avatar { padding-right: 0; }
}


/*** UIX -- HIDE AD STYLER ***/

@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_adStylerMinWidth}px) {
	.Responsive .uix_adStylerColorOptions,
	.Responsive .footer .choosers.chooser_AdStyler { display: none; }
}

<xen:comment> <!-- ACTUAL SEARCH POSITION --> </xen:comment>
<xen:set var="$uix_searchPosition"><xen:if is="( {xen:property uix_searchPosition} == 1 && ( {xen:property uix_navStyle} == 2 || ({xen:property uix_navStyle} == 3 && {xen:property uix_pageStyle} != 1) ) || ({xen:property uix_searchPosition} == 0 && {xen:property uix_removeTabLinks}) )">2<xen:else />{xen:property uix_searchPosition}</xen:if></xen:set>

input[type=search],
input[type=text] {
	-webkit-appearance: none;
}

#calroot {	
	box-shadow: 4px 4px 10px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
}

#QuickSearchQuery {
	min-height: 0;
	
	{xen:property uix_quickSearchStyle}
}

#QuickSearch .formPopup .secondaryControls {
	width: {xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth};
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

#QuickSearch .formPopup .controlsWrapper .textCtrl {
	width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth} - 20'}px;
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

<xen:comment> /********* RESET DEFAULT XENFORO SEARCH STYLING **********/ </xen:comment>

	#QuickSearch {
		display: inline-block;
		position: relative;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		vertical-align: top;
		background-color: transparent;
		padding: 0;
		line-height: normal;
		text-align: left;
	}
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		position: static;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		height: auto;
		width: {xen:property uix_quickSearchPlaceholderSize};
		padding: 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall};
		box-sizing: content-box;
		text-align: center;
		font-size: {xen:property uix_quickSearchPlaceholderSize};
		text-indent: 0;
		color: inherit;
		background-image: none;
		
		-webkit-transform-style: preserve-3d;
		transform-style: preserve-3d;
		
	}
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder:before
	{
		display: inline-block;
		position: relative;
		vertical-align: top;
	}	
	#QuickSearch #commonSearches .arrowWidget 
	{
		float: none;
		margin: 0 auto;
	}
	
	<xen:comment> tbro
	.withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList {
		margin-right: 8px;
	}
	</xen:comment>
	
	#QuickSearch.active 
	{
		box-shadow: none;
		padding-bottom: 0;
	}	
	#QuickSearch .formPopup 
	{
		background: none;
		width: auto;
	}
	#QuickSearch .formPopup .controlsWrapper 
	{
		background: none;
		padding: 0;
		margin: 0;
	}
	#QuickSearch .formPopup .primaryControls 
	{
		padding: 0;
	}
	
#QuickSearch .formPopup .secondaryControls {
	box-shadow: 4px 4px 10px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
	padding: 10px;
	border: solid 1px {xen:property primaryLight};
	border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};
	background: {xen:property primaryLighterStill};
	color: {xen:property contentText};
	position: absolute;
	top: {xen:calc '( {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) + 10'}px;
	z-index: 7500;
}
	
#QuickSearch input.button.primary {
	margin-right: 5px;
}

#QuickSearch a.button.moreOptions {
	float: left;
	margin: 0;
	/* width: 87px; */ <xen:comment> Who added a specific width here? --mc </xen:comment>
}

input[type='search']::-webkit-search-decoration, 
input[type='search']::-webkit-search-cancel-button, 
input[type='search']::-webkit-search-results-button,
input[type='search']::-webkit-search-results-decoration {
	display: none;
}

#QuickSearch .primaryControls {
	position: relative;
}

<xen:comment> /********** QUICKSEARCH.SHOW STYLING ************/ </xen:comment>
	
	#QuickSearch.show {
		display: block;
		position: absolute;
		transform: none;
		box-shadow: 4px 4px 10px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
		border: solid 1px {xen:property primaryLight};
		border-radius: {xen:property uix_globalBorderRadius};
		background: {xen:property primaryLighterStill};
		padding: 0 0 10px;
		margin-top: -10px;
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show .primaryControls .uix_icon.uix_icon-search {
		display: none;
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show #QuickSearchQuery {
		width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth} - 20'}px;
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show .formPopup .primaryControls {
		padding: 10px 10px 0 10px;
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show .formPopup .secondaryControls {
		position: static;
		box-shadow: none;
		background: none;
		border: none;
	}
	
<xen:comment> /********* SEARCH AS ICON SETTING **********/ </xen:comment>

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth} !=  '100%'">
	
	@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth})
	{
		.Responsive #QuickSearch 
		{
			display: none;
		}
		.Responsive #QuickSearchPlaceholder
		{
			display: inline-block;
		}
		.Responsive #QuickSearch.show
		{
			display: inline-block;
		}
		
	}
<xen:else />
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder
	{
		display: inline-block;
	}
	#QuickSearch
	{
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:comment> /********* SEARCH BUTTON SETTING **********/ </xen:comment>

#QuickSearch .primaryControls .uix_icon {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	line-height: {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.height};
	text-align: center;
}

<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_searchButton}">
	
	#QuickSearch .primaryControls .uix_icon
	{
		{xen:if {xen:property uix_searchButtonPosition}, 'left: 0;', 'right: 0;'}
		{xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle}
		<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
			border-radius: {xen:if {xen:property uix_searchButtonPosition}, '0 {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} 0', '{xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} 0 0 {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius}'};
		<xen:else />	
			border-radius: {xen:if {xen:property uix_searchButtonPosition}, '{xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} 0 0 {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius}', '0 {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} {xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.border-radius} 0'};
		</xen:if>	
	}
	
	#QuickSearch:not(.show) #QuickSearchQuery 
	{
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_searchButtonPosition} == 0">
			padding-right: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.width} + {xen:property uix_quickSearchStyle.padding-right}'}px;
		<xen:elseif is="{xen:property uix_searchButtonPosition} == 1" />
			padding-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_searchButtonStyle.width} + {xen:property uix_quickSearchStyle.padding-left}'}px;
		</xen:if>
	}
	
<xen:else />
	
	<xen:comment> make room for placeholder icon </xen:comment>
	#QuickSearch:not(.show) #QuickSearchQuery { text-indent: 1rem; }
	
	#QuickSearch .primaryControls .uix_icon { left: {xen:property uix_quickSearchStyle.padding-left}; }
	
</xen:if>


<xen:comment> /********* MINIMAL SEARCH STYLING **********/ </xen:comment>
<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_searchMinimalSize}">

	#uix_searchMinimal { 
		box-sizing: border-box;
		pointer-events: none; 
	}
	
	#uix_searchMinimal.show { pointer-events: auto; }
	
	
	<xen:comment> /****** MINIMAL SEARCH ANIMATIONS *******/ </xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 0">
	
		<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_pageStyle} == 1">#navigation.withSearch .tabLinks .pageWidth { position: relative; }</xen:if>
	
		#uix_searchMinimal {
			float: right;
			position: absolute;
			right: 0;
			top: 0;
			
			opacity: 0;
			width: 0;
  			
  			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity, width;	
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
  			-webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
  			
			transition-property: opacity, width;	
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
  			transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
		}
		
			#uix_searchMinimal.show {
				opacity: 1;
				width: 100%;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}; 
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}; 
			}
		
		.navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList,
		#searchBar { 
			opacity: 1;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			
			transition-property: opacity;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
		}
		
			.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTab.selected .blockLinksList,
			.uix_searchMinimalActive #searchBar {
				pointer-events: none; 
				opacity: 0;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: 0s;
				transition-delay: 0s;
			}
	
	<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 1" />
	
		#uix_searchMinimal {
			float: right;
			opacity: 0;
			width: 0;	
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity, width;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
			
			transition-property: opacity, width;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
		}
		
			#uix_searchMinimal.show { 
				opacity: 1;
				width: 100%;
			
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			}
		
		#QuickSearchPlaceholder { 
			opacity: 1;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: width, padding, opacity;
			-webkit-transition-duration: 0s, 0s, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			
			transition-property: width, padding, opacity;
			transition-duration: 0s, 0s, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
		}
		
			.uix_searchMinimalActive #QuickSearchPlaceholder {
				opacity: 0;
				pointer-events: none;
				width: 0;
				padding: 0;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, 0s;
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, 0s;
			}
		
	<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 2" />
		
		#uix_searchMinimal {
			float: right;
			position: absolute;
			right: 0;
			/* top: 0; */ <xen:comment> -tbro- </xen:comment>
			opacity: 0;
			width: 0;	
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity, width;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
			
			transition-property: opacity, width;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
		}
		
			#uix_searchMinimal.show { 
				opacity: 1;
				width: 100%;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			}
		
		
		#navigation.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navRight,
		#navigation.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navLeft,
		#navigation.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navTab { pointer-events: none; }
		
		.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks { pointer-events: auto; }
			
		#navigation .navTabs .navTab > *:not(.tabLinks),
		#navigation #logo_small {
			opacity: 1;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
		}
		
			#navigation.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navTab > *:not(.tabLinks),
			#navigation.uix_searchMinimalActive #logo_small {
				opacity: 0;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} 0s;
				transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} 0s;
			}
		


	<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 3" />
	
		#userBar .pageWidth { position: relative; }
	
		#uix_searchMinimal {
			position: absolute;
			right: 0;
			/* top: 0; */ <xen:comment> -tbro- </xen:comment>
			opacity: 0;
			width: 0;	
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity, width;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
			
			transition-property: opacity, width;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
		}
		
			#uix_searchMinimal.show { 
				opacity: 1;
				width: 100%;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			}	
	
		#userBar.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navRight,
		#userBar.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navLeft,
		#userBar.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navTab { pointer-events: none; }
			
		#userBar .navTabs .navTab > *:not(.tabLinks) {
			opacity: 1;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
		}
		
			#userBar.uix_searchMinimalActive .navTabs .navTab > *:not(.tabLinks) {
				opacity: 0;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} 0s;
				transition: opacity {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed} 0s;
			}
			
	<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 4" />
		
		.breadBoxTop,
		.breadBoxTop .pageWidth { position: relative; }
		
		#uix_searchMinimal {
			position: absolute;
			
			top: 0;
			opacity: 0;
			width: 0;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity, width;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
			
			transition-property: opacity, width;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
		}
		
		.hasLeftSidebar #uix_searchMinimal { left: 0; }
		
		.hasRightSidebar #uix_searchMinimal { right: 0; }
		
			#uix_searchMinimal.show {
				opacity: 1;
				width: 100%;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
				transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed}, {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};	
			}
		
		.breadBoxTop nav,
		.breadBoxTop .topCtrl {
			opacity: 1;
			
			/* transition to inactive */
			-webkit-transition-property: opacity;
			-webkit-transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			-webkit-transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			
			transition-property: opacity;
			transition-duration: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
			transition-delay: {xen:property uix_searchMinimal_speed};
		}
		
			.breadBoxTop.uix_searchMinimalActive nav,
			.breadBoxTop.uix_searchMinimalActive .topCtrl {
				pointer-events: none;
				opacity: 0;
				
				/* transition to active */
				-webkit-transition-delay: 0s;
				transition-delay: 0s;
			}
			
		@media (max-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
			.Responsive .breadBoxTop.topCtrl,
			.Responsive .breadBoxTop.uix_searchMinimalActive .topCtrl {
				-webkit-transition: none;
				transition: none;
				pointer-events: auto;
				opacity: 1;
			}
		}
		
	</xen:if>

<xen:comment>
/****************************************************************************************************/
/********** SEARCH POSITIONS **********/
/****************************************************************************************************/
</xen:comment>

<xen:if is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 0">
	
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks { overflow: visible; }
	
	<xen:comment> UNINTENTIONAL SELECTOR SCOPE WITH .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li </xen:comment>
	#QuickSearch .formPopup li { 
		line-height: normal;
		float: none;
		padding: 0;
		margin: 0;
		border: none;
		box-shadow: none;
	}
	<xen:comment> COPIED FROM form.css, PREPENDED WITH #QuickSearch </xen:comment>
	#QuickSearch .ctrlUnit > dd > * > li
	{
		margin: 4px 0 8px;
		padding-left: 1px; /* fix a webkit display bug */
	}
	
	#searchBar {
		line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
		height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
		float: right;
	}
	
	#uix_searchMinimal form {
		line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
		height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeight};
	}
	
	#QuickSearch {
		transform: translateY(-50%);
		top: 50%;
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		color: {xen:property navTabLink.color};
		height: 100%;
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder:before {
		top: 50%;
		vertical-align: top;
		transform: translateY(-50%);	
	}
	
	<xen:comment> Fixing specificity bug in which the selector for the tablink anchors affects quicksearch buttons. </xen:comment>
	
	#QuickSearch a.button {
		{xen:property button}
	}
	
	#QuickSearch a.button:hover {
		{xen:property buttonHover}
	}
	
	<xen:if is= "{xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth} != '100%'">
		@media (min-width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth} + 1'}px)
		{
			.withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList {
				margin-right: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth} + ( 2 * {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} ) + 8'}px;
			}
		}
		@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth})
		{
			.Responsive .withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList {	
				margin-right: {xen:calc '( 2 * {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} ) + 8 + {xen:property uix_quickSearchPlaceholderSize}'}px;
			}
		}
	<xen:else />
	
		.withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList {
			margin-right: {xen:calc '( 2 * {xen:property uix_gutterWidthSmall} ) + 8 + {xen:property uix_quickSearchPlaceholderSize}'}px;
		}
	
	</xen:if>
	
	<xen:comment> SEARCH IN STICKY NAVIGATION </xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stickyNavigation}">
	
		.activeSticky #searchBar {
			line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky};
			height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky};
		}
		
		.activeSticky #uix_searchMinimal form {
			line-height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky};
			height: {xen:property uix_tabLinksHeightSticky};
		}
		
	</xen:if>		
	
<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 1" />
	
	<xen:comment> IF LOGO IS NOT CENTERED BY DEFAULT </xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_widthToCenterLogo} != '100%'">
		
		#searchBar {
			float: right;
			line-height: {xen:calc '{xen:property headerLogoHeight} - 4'}px;
			*line-height: {xen:property headerLogoHeight};
			height: {xen:property headerLogoHeight};
		}
		
		.hasFlexbox #searchBar {
			margin-left: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth};
			line-height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
			height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
			
			<xen:comment> SET FLEX SHRINK TO FALSE </xen:comment>
			-ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
			-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
			flex: 0 0 auto;
		}
		
		#QuickSearch,
		#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
			vertical-align: middle;
		}
		
		.hasFlexbox #QuickSearch,
		.hasFlexbox #QuickSearchPlaceholder {
			vertical-align: initial;
		}
		
		#QuickSearch.show {
			top: calc(50% - {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight} / 2'}px)	
		}
		
		@media (max-width: {xen:property uix_widthToCenterLogo}) {
			.Responsive #searchBar {
				text-align: center;
				margin: 0 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidth} 0;
			}
			
			.Responsive #searchBar {
				float: none;
				line-height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
				height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
			}
			
			.Responsive #QuickSearch.show {
				right: calc(50% - {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth} + 10) / 2'}px);	
			}
		}
	
	<xen:comment> IF LOGO IS CENTERED BY DEFAULT </xen:comment>	
	<xen:else />
		
		#searchBar {
			text-align: center;
			float: none;
			line-height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
			height: {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight};
			
			margin: 0 0 {xen:property uix_gutterWidth} 0;
		}
		
		#QuickSearch.show {
			right: calc(50% - {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_quickSearchWidth} + 10) / 2'}px);
		}
		
	</xen:if>
	
		
<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 2" />

	<xen:comment> NECESSARY FOR MINIMAL SEARCH ANIMATIONS </xen:comment>
	#navigation .navTabs > ul { height: {xen:property headerTabHeight}; }
		
	#searchBar,
	#uix_searchMinimal form {
		line-height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
		height: {xen:property headerTabHeight};
	}
	
	#QuickSearch {
		transform: translateY(-50%);
		top: 50%;
		padding: 0 10px; <xen:comment> AS IN THE VISITOR TABS </xen:comment>
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		color: {xen:property navLink.color};
		padding: 0 10px; <xen:comment> AS IN THE VISITOR TABS </xen:comment>
		height: 100%;
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder:before {
		top: 50%;
		vertical-align: top;
		transform: translateY(-50%);	
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show {
		margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property headerTabHeight} - {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) / 2 - 5 '}px;
		top: 0;
	}
	
	<xen:comment> SEARCH IN STICKY NAVIGATION </xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stickyNavigation}">
	
		.activeSticky #QuickSearch.show {
			margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight} - {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) / 2 - 10'}px;
			top: 0;
		}
		
		.activeSticky #searchBar,
		.activeSticky #uix_searchMinimal form {
			line-height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
			height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight};
		}
		
		<xen:comment> NECESSARY FOR MINIMAL SEARCH ANIMATIONS </xen:comment>
		<xen:comment> tbro
			#navigation.activeSticky .navTabs > ul { height: {xen:property uix_fixedNavigationHeight}; }
		</xen:comment>
	</xen:if>
	
<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 3" />

	<xen:comment> NECESSARY FOR ANIMATIONS </xen:comment>
		
	<xen:comment> tbro	
		#userBar .navTabs > ul { height: {xen:property uix_userBarHeight}; }
	</xen:comment>
	
	#searchBar,
	#uix_searchMinimal form {
		line-height: {xen:property uix_userBarHeight};
		height: {xen:property uix_userBarHeight};
	}
	
	#QuickSearch {
		top: 50%;
		transform: translateY(-50%);
		padding: 0 10px; <xen:comment> AS IN THE VISITOR TABS </xen:comment>	
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		color: {xen:property uix_userBarLink.color};
		padding: 0 10px; <xen:comment> AS IN THE VISITOR TABS </xen:comment>
		height: 100%;
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder:before {
		top: 50%;
		vertical-align: top;
		transform: translateY(-50%);	
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show {
		margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_userBarHeight} - {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) / 2 - 5 '}px;
		top: 0;
	}
	
	<xen:comment> SEARCH IN STICKY USER BAR </xen:comment>
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_stickyUserBar}">
	
		<xen:comment> NECESSARY FOR ANIMATIONS </xen:comment>
		
		<xen:comment> tbro
			#userBar.activeSticky .navTabs > ul { height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight}; }
		</xen:comment>
		
		.activeSticky #searchBar,
		.activeSticky #uix_searchMinimal form {
			line-height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
			height: {xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight};
		}
						
		.activeSticky #QuickSearch.show
		{
			margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property uix_fixedUserBarHeight} - {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) / 2 - 5'}px;
		}
	</xen:if>
	
<xen:elseif is="{$uix_searchPosition} == 4" />

	#uix_searchMinimal form {
		line-height: {xen:property breadcrumb.height};
	}
	
	#searchBar {
		height: 100%
	}
	
	.breadBoxTop {
		overflow: visible;
	}
	
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		height: {xen:property breadcrumb.height};
		line-height: {xen:property breadcrumb.height};
	}
	
	#QuickSearch {
		transform: translateY(-50%);
		top: 50%;
	}
	
	.hasLeftSidebar #QuickSearch { 
		left: 0;
		right: auto;
	}
	
	#QuickSearch.show {
		margin-top: {xen:calc '({xen:property breadcrumb.height} - {xen:property uix_quickSearchHeight}) / 2 - 5 '}px;
		top: 0;
	}
	
	.breadBoxBottom .uix_breadCrumb_toggleList li.toggleList_item.toggleList_item_search {
		display: none;
	}
	
	<xen:if is="{xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth} !=  '100%'">
	
		@media (min-width: {xen:calc '{xen:property uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth} + 1'}px) {
			.uix_breadCrumb_toggleList li.toggleList_item.toggleList_item_search {
				border: none;
				background: none;
				box-shadow: none;
			}
			
			.hasLeftSidebar .uix_breadCrumb_toggleList li.toggleList_item.toggleList_item_search { margin-right: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth}; }
			
			.hasRightSidebar .uix_breadCrumb_toggleList li.toggleList_item.toggleList_item_search { margin-left: {xen:property uix_gutterWidth}; }
		}
	
	
	</xen:if>
	
</xen:if>	<xen:comment> END SEARCH POSITIONS </xen:comment>

<xen:comment>
		This CSS file is for finding images and overwriting 
		them with our own CSS sprite that is retina friendly
</xen:comment>


/* Find the images, set the new image */

.LoggedIn .discussionListItem .unreadLink,
.LoggedIn .discussionListItem .ReadToggle,
.discussionListItem .iconKey span,
.event .content .thread .icon,
.event .content .forum .icon,
.footerLinks a.globalFeed,
.messageNotices .icon,
.rating .star,
.resourceAlerts .icon,
.thread_view .threadAlerts .icon,
.alerts .newIcon,
.alertsPopup .newIcon,
.DismissParent .DismissCtrl {
	background-image: url({xen:property imagePath}/uix/sprite.png) !important;
	width: 16px; 
	height: 16px;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
}


/* Set the background-position */

.LoggedIn .discussionListItem .unreadLink,
.LoggedIn .discussionListItem.unread .ReadToggle {background-position: 0 -32px;}
.LoggedIn .discussionListItem .ReadToggle:hover {background-position: -16px -32px;}

.discussionListItem .iconKey .sticky    { background-position:   0px -16px; }
.discussionListItem .iconKey .starred   { background-position: -64px -32px;}
.discussionListItem .iconKey .watched   { background-position: -144px -16px;}
.discussionListItem .iconKey .locked    { background-position: -16px -16px; }
.discussionListItem .iconKey .moderated { background-position: -32px -16px; }
.discussionListItem .iconKey .redirect  { background-position: -48px -16px; }
.discussionListItem .iconKey .new       { background-position: -64px -16px; }

.event .content .thread .icon {background-position: -96px -16px;}
.event .content .forum .icon {background-position: -80px -16px;}

.footerLinks a.globalFeed {background-position: -112px -16px;}

.messageNotices .deletedNotice .icon { background-position: -48px -32px; }		
.messageNotices .warningNotice .icon { background-position: -32px -32px; }		
.messageNotices .moderatedNotice .icon {background-position: -32px -16px; }

.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover .SplitCtrl {background-position: -128px ; }

.rating .star {background-position: -96px -32px !important;}
.rating .star.Full {background-position: -64px -32px !important;}
.rating .star.Half,
.rating .star.Full.Half {background-position: -80px -32px !important;}

.resourceAlerts .deletedAlert .icon { background-position: -48px -32px; }
.resourceAlerts .moderatedAlert .icon { background-position: -32px -16px; }

.thread_view .threadAlerts .deletedAlert .icon { background-position: -48px -32px; }
.thread_view .threadAlerts .moderatedAlert .icon { background-position: -32px -32px; }
.thread_view .threadAlerts .lockedAlert .icon { background-position: -16px -16px; }

.alerts .newIcon,
.alertsPopup .newIcon {background-position: -112px -32px;}
	
.DismissParent .DismissCtrl {background-position: -80px 0;}
.DismissParent:hover .DismissCtrl:hover {background-position: -96px 0;}
.DismissParent:hover .DismissCtrl:active {background-position: -112px 0;}

	.DismissParent .DismissCtrl {

	}
         
}
